description.zh: 本課程針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變）。
description.en: This course targets at the brief introduction to the fundamental principles, characteristics and application of the metal, ceramics, polymer and composite material. This course includes the crystal structure and defect, atomic diffusion of the solid materials, phase diagrams and phase transformation, material manufacturing process and application, the physic property (optical, electrical, magnetic and thermal property), mechanical property (strength, ductility, hardness, toughness, fatigue, and creep).

description.zh: 教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及限制,準確度等。內容有紅、可見、紫外、X光 、核磁共振光譜、表面分析之電子質譜方法、熱分析以及不同的分析方法如 、液體層析等。
description.en: This text will introduce the fundamental principles and Applications of modern Analytical instruments.Measuring devices, limitations of measurements in terms of sensitivity and accuracy will also be taught. The contents are infrared, visible, ultraviolet, X-ray and nuclear magnetic spectroscopes, Analysis of sur-faces with electron beams and mass spectrometry, thermal methods and chromatography and related separation methods.

description.zh: 介紹氣體的物理性質，熱力學第一、第二與第三定律，化學反應之熱能變化與動力學，以及系統中的相平衡。
description.en: This course contents the following subjects: the physical properties of gases, the first law, second law and third law of thermodynamics, enthalpy change in chemical reaction, chemical kinetic and the phase equilibria in a system.

description.zh: 本課程包含兩個部分。一、討論各種纖維之化學組成、合成與成形之理論，同時針對纖維之性質、纖維改質與組成、合成、成形間之關係與影響因素及檢測加以講授。 二、說明纖維之形態與微觀及巨觀結構、纖維長度分佈與斷面、密度、吸水性與膨潤性、機械性質、光學性質、熱性質，黏彈性質，及電氣性質等物理性質及其測試。
description.en: This course includes two parts. Part 1: A major object of this course is to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization. A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties and their testing. Part 2: The course interprets the following subjects, such as: (1) Morphology of the fibers. (2) Microstructure and macrostructure of fibers. (3) Staple fiber length and cross-section. (4) Fiber density and absorption. (5) Mechanical properties. (6) Optical properties. (7) Thermal properties. (8) Fiber Viscoelasticity. (9) Electrical properties etc and their testing.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
description.en: The course introduces various kinds of organic synthetic methods, principles and applications.  The most commonly used organic reactions and their mechanisms are also discussed.

description.zh: 介紹各類紡織纖維之染色理論與基本染色方法；包括染料應用上之分類與紡織物纖維的類別，一般染色之理論，染色機械之類別，纖維素纖維、蛋白質纖維、聚酯纖維、聚醯胺纖維、聚丙烯睛纖維及其混紡織物的染色原理及應用以及各種纖維染色缺點以及防止與修正缺點之方法。
description.en: Introducing the dyeing theory and dyeing method of various textile fibers; which include the classification of dyestuffs and textile fibers, the dyeing machine, the dyeing theory and dyeing methods of cellulosic fibers, protein fibers, synthetic fibers and their blends, also the cause and correction of dyeing defects.

description.zh: 配合高分子化學課程的講授，教導學生親自配製試葯、操作儀器﹐進行高分子聚合實驗、檢驗分析與結果討論﹐訓練學生的實驗室合成技巧及基本的高分子材料鑑定分析儀器之技術﹐包括光譜分析 (IR, NMR, UV, PL, EL etc), 分子量量測(GPC), 熱分析(DSC, TGA)等之分析技術
description.en: Experimental techniques include: the Lab work of polymer synthesis , the charterization of polymer materials and the operation of the related instruments, including spectrum analysis (IR, NMR, UV, PL, EL etc), the measurement of molecular weight (GPC), thermal analysis (DSC, TGA) etc.

name.en: Practice of Yarn and Fabric Formation

description.zh: 實際了解和操作短纖維及長纖維的主要紡紗與織布製程。對相關工廠的流程設計和產品企劃也應一併予以知悉。
description.en: To understand the process technology of yarn and fabric formation in detail. The plant design and the product planning are also evaluated.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1.頻率響應分析，2.回授放大器，3.電路之穩定性分析，4.運算放大器，5.波形之合成與整形電路，6.濾波器，7.功率放大器。
description.en: 1.Frequency response 2.Feedback amplifier3.Stability analysis4.Operational amplifier5.Waveform generators and shaping 6.Filter7.Power amplifier

description.zh: 內容包函：(1)串級放大電路; (2)場效電晶體之特性; (3)場效電晶體放大電路; (4)運算放大器應用電路(反相放大器、非反相放大器、加法器、減法器、對數放大器、積分器、微分器、比較器); (5)基本振盪電路(RC振盪電路、韋恩電橋振盪電路、石英晶體振盪電路、無穩態多諧振盪電路、單穩態多諧振盪電路、雙穩態多諧振盪電路、施密特觸發器、方波產生電路、三角波產生電路); (6)高頻電路、低頻電路之嚮應; (7)回授放大器; (8)放大器之穩定性實驗; (9)振盪器設計; (10)主動濾波器; (11)功率電路。
description.en: 1.Response of low-frequency circuits 2.Response of high-frequency circuits 3.Feedback amplifier 4.Stability of amplifier 5.Design of oscillator 6.Operational amplifier 7.Active filter 8.Power amplifier circuit

description.zh: 1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統3. 雙旁波帶AM調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統4. 單旁波帶AM調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸5. FM調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en: The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 2.design of analog filters3.double sideband AM systems4.single sideband AM systems5.FM systems6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems10.digital passband transmission11.multiplexing systems12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

description.zh: 1.複數2.複函數 3.諧和函數4.複數積分5.柯西積分理論6.複冪級數7.洛冉級數,餘數8.保角寫像
description.en: 1.Complex Numbers2.Complex Functions3.Harmonic Functions4.Complex Integration5.Cauchy Theory of Integration 6.Complex Power Series7.Laurent Series,Residues8.Conformal Mapping

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1.簡介2.信號與系統3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變7.數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: (1)簡介(2)FPGA系統(3)FPGA結構(4)組合邏輯設計(5)順序機設計(6)FPGA雛形系統設計(7)FPGA雛形系統驗證(8)大型系統設計
description.en: (1)Introduction(2)FPGA-Based Systems(3)FPGA Fabrics(4)Combinational Logic Design(5)Sequential Machines Design(6)FPGA Prototyping Systems Design(7)FPGA Prototyping Systems Verification(8)Large-Scale Systems Design

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程介紹產品創新方法的各項基本概念，並以小組討論方式進行文獻及個案研討。藉此讓學生學習系統化產品創新的程序與方法，並應用創意的思惟方式於產品創新過程。
description.en: In this course, the basic concepts of product innovation method would be introduced and the related references and cases would be studied by group discussion. That makes students learn the procedure and method of systematic product innovation and apply the creative thinking method to the product innovation.

description.zh: 本課程探討企業管理之基本課題，除了作業面外，也包含管理策略面。
description.en: This course discusses the fundamental issues regarding the business management.  Both the operational and managerial levels are covered.

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程主要在介紹生產排程的基本理論與方法，使學生奠定排程研究與排程實務問題解決的基礎。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on the basic concept on scheduling. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic methodologies of scheduling, and to understand the scheduling application aspects.

description.en: Integration of the interior design foundation courses, such as: basic interior design principles, basic drawings, work drawings, hand-drew perspective, computer 3D performance, building construction, interior architecture, decoration materials, landscape and indoor gardening etc. The course aims to stimulate creativity and to develop problem-solving abilities through the practices of proper design methods and the actual design process.

description.zh: 了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en: The course is concerned with the design and production of jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is delivered through a programme of lectures and practical design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques ofproduction , and its processes and equipments. Based on the foundation of design skills, the students can practice the techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
description.en: 1. Graphic standards for working drawing. 2. Drawing preparation and process. 3. Selected shop drawing

Introductionto Compressible Flow.

description.en: This course aims to train students in understanding the fundamental vehicle electrical requirements, and utilizing tools to design and implement the electric circuits. description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion in depth on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其設計，內容涵蓋如下：冷凍工程原理，冷凍系統之設備，各種冷凍系統之設計，冷凍負荷計算，冷媒管路之設計與計算，冷凍庫之設計。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system design; the contents cover the following topics: the principles of refrigeration engineering, the equipment and designs of different refrigeration systems, refrigeration load calculations, design and calculation of refrigerant piping, and refrigeration storage design.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，包括一次及二次系統的設計考慮，配電變壓器的應用，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Planning and automation of power distribution systems, including system design considerations, power transformer applications, voltage and power loss and calculations, modulations of power supply, load analysis, and failure analysis.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

name.en: Reading and Discussions on Global Affairs

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生經由閱讀與討論以了解全球共同面對的課題，包括：全球化的趨勢、文化衝突與恐怖主義、全球貧富差距、環境保護問題、基因工程所衍生的倫理道德問題等等。
description.en: Through reading and discussions, the students are guided to understand some of the most important issues that have affected the present world and its future.  These topics include globalization in world economy, health care problems, environmental protection, racial conflicts, and genetic engineering.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

description.zh: 本課程之設計是用來發展現代各種英語教學法之理論與實務。
description.en: This course is designed to develop understanding principles, current practices and skills of the methods used in the teaching of English.

description.zh: 以對流行事物，如電影，音樂，廣告，服裝，電視，通俗小說等，在當代文化思潮中的影響，及其所扮演角色探討為經，並對於英語在各範疇中展現之語彙，修辭，語法，技巧之賞析為緯，引領學生進入一個交織著現代語文與現代意涵的世界。
description.en: This course aims at giving an approach to the study of television, popular music, popular literature such as magazines and best sellers, fashion and movies, as well as an examination into the influence of all aspects of our daily lives on our basic beliefs and values. It involves the use of methodologies from both the humanities and the social sciences in the effort to interpret expressive cultural forms. Students are encouraged to participate in discussion over selected topics from contemporary issues.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階法語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their French abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the French language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is enable students to enhance their Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵、以配合企業整體競爭策略和形式。其內容計有：人力資源的分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬，人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course is introduce that how to use resource about inside of Business and staff. It's including ability, knowledge, technology, attitude and encourage. To harmony with tactics and form of entirety business. The context of course have Human Resources Analysis, tactics and goal, support to operating about how to get, developing, rewards, and maintain of human resources.

notes: 第1-5週樊學良老師，第6週起改為陳建丞老師

description.zh: 經理需要以現代管理必要的 "資訊-基礎"來支持，俾使達到和滿足(相遇)他們的組織目標。管理資訊系統(MIS) 是整合使用者和機構系統，用以提供一個組織之操作支援，管理分析，和決策功能。我們以學習資訊工作者的角色，幫助經理滿足(相遇)組織目標， 以及檢查資訊系統的特徵，使經理工作更容易順暢。學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢、透過資訊系統應用，支持經理和執行、管理固有的冒險，俾使發展和資訊系統應用、獲得和實踐技術性領導
description.en: 英文概述	The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. A management information system (MIS) is an integrated user + Machine system that provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning:‧Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems.‧Supporting managers and executives through IS applications.‧Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications.‧Attaining and practicing technological leadership.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解國際金融之理論與國際金融市場之概況：1.國際金融市場形成之基礎和背景2.介紹中央銀行及國際公營金融中介機構3.外匯市場、國際債券市場、國際股票市場、衍生性金融商品市場4.國際利率套利與利率均衡論5.國際金融市場與金融創新
description.en: To understand theory of international finance and the international financial markets. 1.Introduction to the international financial markets 2.Central banks and international public financial intermediaries, such as BIS and World Bank. 3.Foreign Exchange Market, Int'l Bond Market, Int'l Stock Market, Derivative Market, etc. 4.Interest Rate Parity Theory. 5.Financial Revolution

description.zh: 本課程教導學生在管理領域內英文的運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習（1）個人履歷表的撰寫（2）會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備，（3）企業企劃書與計劃的編寫（4）企業財務報告，及（5）現代化全球管理的專題。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文作報告與討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the use of English within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Write-up of personal curriculum vitae; (2) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (3) Business proposals and plans; (4) Business financial reports and (5) Contemporary issues and trend in global management communities. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality.  In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study.  The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

description.zh: 管理會計是整理和產生各種會計資料和情報以幫助各階層的管理人員完成管理任務。本課程共分三篇，第一篇是會計資料與企業決策之間的關係，其中共有五章分別介紹決策步驟與收集資料及選擇資料的近代會計方法論。第二篇是如何運用各項資料於企業決策，其至中包括四章，針對各項，各種特殊型態的決策需求，找出所需各項資料。第三篇是有關決策系統之各項計畫與控制制度，其中各章針對決策資料如何實用化與協調化。全文強調有關會計人員、經濟人員及財務人員皆可透過本書各項功能而達到分析與管理目的。
description.en: Management Accounting: Management Accounting is used to produce Accounting Information to help manager accomplishing managerial missions. In this Course, there are three subjects as follows: 1) The relationship between Accounting information and Business Decisions. 2) How to apply all types of information into Decision Model. 3) The planning and controlling of managerial decision will also be discussed, and 4) Case study

description.en: This course is designed to introduce concepts and skills essential in the database systems. description.zh: 先修課程：普通物理、工程數學。 從黑體輻射之頻譜分析開始，引入量子化的概念；進而推出物質與波動之二象性。經由波爾之半古典的氫原子模型，結合量子化的概念以解釋原子結構，並引入薛丁格方程式所求得之波函數與電子之空間機率的關係。再由原子進而推廣至分子及固態物理之能帶理論，應用能帶理論於解釋固態晶體之光、電及熱學等特性，並介紹半導體之應用的基本原理。
description.en: From the analysis of the spectrum of black-body radiation, the concept of quantization is introduced and the duality of matter and wave is also introduced. Combining the idea of quantization and the semi-classical hydrogen model of Bohr, the structure of atom is described. Solving the Schrodinger equation, the deduced wave function is related to the probability of finding the electron in space. The concept of atom is expanded to the molecular and the energy band theory of solid state physics. The energy band theory of solid state physics is applied to account the optical, electrical, and thermal properties of solid states, also the fundamental principles of semiconductors are introduced.

description.zh: 本課程始自ㄧ系列關於「古代哲學」的演講，特別著重於自然主義哲學家的思想，如泰利斯、巴門尼德斯、赫拉克利圖斯，與德摩克利圖斯。藉此讓我們得以瞭解下述議題: 宇宙的基本物質、變化問題，與原子論。接下來，我們會探討希臘哲學，著重於:辯士學派、蘇格拉底、柏拉圖，與亞里斯多德。我們接著探討希臘化時期的學說: 如犬儒主義、斯多葛主義、伊比鳩魯學派、新柏拉圖主義，與神祕主義。最後我們轉向中世紀哲學，再接著探討文藝復興與巴洛克時期的思想。
description.en: The course starts with a series of lectures on ancient philosophy with an emphasis of thoughts presented by the Naturalistic philosophers who initiate our research interest in the Nature and our surroundings such as Thales, Parmenides, Heraclitus, and Democritus.  By doing so we would learn the following important topics such as the basic matter of the universe, the problem of change, and atomism.  We then shall move onto Greek philosophy with a particular look at the following philosophers: the Sophists, Socratics, Plato, and Aristotles.  Afterwards, we will study the theories and accounts during the Hellenistic period such as Cynicism, Stoicism, Epicureanism, Neo-Platonism, and Mysticism. We then will turn to Medieval philosophy, followed by a close look at thoughts appeared in the Renaissance and Baroque era.

description.zh: 文化創意產業含蓋甚廣，不僅僅包含了人文、藝術，甚至在族群文化振興、媒體研究、博物館經營與藝術管理、大眾消費、設計等領域都被重視。也因為文化創意是一塊值得投資的領域，更誘引這些族群的工作者紛紛投入與文化創意產業結合的工作。而本課程將全程使用英文來授課，也可藉由閱讀國內外文化創意相關文章，培養學生的英文閱讀、聽、說、與寫作能力，進而培養更多元的國際觀。
description.en: Covering a wide cultural and creative industry, the cultural vocation development not only includes the humanities, arts, and even has been valued at ethnic culture promotion; media studies, museum management and arts management, marketing, design, and other related these fields. And through this course will be taught in English, but also by learning the foreign cultural related the cultural articles, students can practice English reading, listening, speaking, and writing skills, and to cultivate more diversified international views.

description.zh: 財務報表所反映的是企業的經營績效，不同的產業有不同的特質、不同的經營環境，即使在相同的產業中，企業若採行不同的競爭策略，在財務報表上也會有不同的表現。本課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何透過財務報表，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：1) 基本財務報導與特別科目的報導與分析 2) 基本分析理論 3) 償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 5) 探討我國最近發佈的7號、34號及35號會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes 1) financial reports and analysis of special accounting subjects; 2) basic financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion.

description.zh: 為培育學生瞭解當前投資決策與理財之實作能力，透過實驗室建置的投資決策模擬競賽環境，以培養學生建立其證券投資分析、金融工具分析、企業評價及資本市場之基本與技術分析等決策能力。進一步訓練學生通過國際與國內相關的投資專業證照考試，以期達到理論與實務充份接軌之目標。
description.en: To nurture students to understand the practical skills of the current investment knowledge, through the investment decision-making simulation laboratory, students build their equity investment analysis, financial instruments, business evaluation, the fundamental and technical analysis of capital market, and other decision-making ability. Further training students to obtain international and domestic investment professional certification exams in order to achieve the goal of seamless integration of theory and practice.

description.zh: 搭配資料庫管理系統與管理資訊系統兩門學理課程，本課程以企業中之骨幹系統─企業資源規劃系統(ERP)為標的，協助同學了解與操做ERP系統中之配銷、生產製造與財務模組。透過實機操做，能夠增進同學對於ERP各模組的知識與實務經驗，並於課程中輔導同學取得ERP系統各模組之相關認證。
description.en: To tie two basics courses of database management system and management information system in coordination, this course takes the enterprise resource planning (ERP) system as target to assist students for information system understanding and operation. There are three modules of ERP system, including: the modules of sale and distribution, production and manufacture and finance. The students’ domain knowledge and practices experience can be extended via ERP system operations. Also, this course intends to assist students to achieve professional certifications for each ERP module.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計實務之進行了解其應用。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及方法操作以及設計執行等方式進行，並以作業繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories and application of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through case studies, method simulation and design practice. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case studies, and design practice. Students are evaluated by design work, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 本課程以專案整合的思維，導引學生學習使用者腳本的設計，以及使用者經驗的分析，提出互動科技技術的分析，並以互動程式的撰寫，完成互動科技應用系統的發展與評估。
description.en: This course provides a project-oriented method for students to learn the integration of interactive programming design in the aspect of interaction design, interactive game and interactive arts project development.

description.zh: 本課程旨在整合應用程式與設計，完成具互動媒體設計作品。為達成此目標，本課程培養學生熟悉與整合互動設計的理論、方法與應用，以具互動性的媒體設計議題，訓練學生獨立創作或分組合作設計，藉此訓練學生創意思考、應用科技與新知的實作能力，同時也可結合產學合作專案於教學活動內，達到務實致用的目標。
description.en: This course applies design and programming into interaction design projects relating to media design. To achieve this goal, students will familiarize the theories, methodology and implications of interactive media design in this course. By interaction design issues, students create and implement ideas by brainstorming through independent study or cooperative learning. For competition without any gap, industry-academic cooperation is one way to prepare student’s critical competencies same as the desired competencies required by the industry.

description.zh: 本課程旨在整合應用程式與設計，完成具互動性的視覺傳達設計作品。為達成此目標，本課程培養學生熟悉與整合互動設計的理論、方法與應用，以具互動性的視覺設計議題，訓練學生獨立創作或分組合作設計，藉此訓練學生創意思考、應用科技與新知的實作能力，同時也可結合產學合作專案於教學活動內，達到務實致用的目標。
description.en: This course applies design and programming into interaction design projects relating to visual communication design. To achieve this goal, students will familiarize the theories, methodology and implications of visual communication design in this course. By interaction design issues, students create and implement ideas by brainstorming through independent study or cooperative learning. For competition without any gap, industry-academic cooperation is one way to prepare student’s critical competencies same as the desired competencies required by the industry.

description.zh: 本課程重點將讓學生認識投影與布幕的相互關係，從不同的光源與反射體的應用創造出視訊投影的藝術作品。利用介紹案例的方式，讓學生認識不同形式的投影藝術，其中包含2D牆面投影藝術、3D建築投影藝術、球型投影、浮空投影等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students the knowledge of projector and screen. Case studies allow students to understand varying types of projection art, including 2D projection on wall, 3D projection on building, spherical projection and holographic projection.

description.zh: 介紹多媒體各項基礎技術，包括文字、圖像、影像、動畫與音訊，以及各項技術的整合應用。
description.en: This course introduces the elements of multimedia design, including text, graphics, video, animation, and audio, as well as the applications of the integration of those elements.

description.zh: 本課程將程式語言之設計，深入介紹電腦動畫之製作。透過實例介紹及應用，讓學生能掌握3D電腦動畫的技術核心，藉以提升相關創作的實作能力。
description.en: This course will use computer programming skill to introduce the computer animation production in-depth. Examples, case studies and applications are used  to enable students to kone the core technology of 3D computer animation production.

name.zh: 行動裝置遊戲設計企劃

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹行動裝置遊戲設計企劃所需了解之專業知識與技術，並透過設計實務的操作使學生能具備行動裝置遊戲設計企劃的實務能力。課程內容包含行動遊戲個案研究、行動遊戲市場分析、行動平台與技術研究、行動遊戲內容設計、遊戲規則與架構設計、遊戲腳本製作、遊戲情境設定等。教學將以課堂講授、分組討論、設計專案執行等方式進行，並以專題報告繳交與課堂發表為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge of mobile game design planning, accompanying with design practice. This will allow students to be equipped with the capability of mobile game design planning. Course contents include mobile game case study, marketing analysis, mobile platform and technologies study, content design, game structure design, script planning and scenario settings. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, group discussion and design project. Students will be evaluated by reports and oral presentation.

description.zh: 本課程概念為數位化產品設計與開發介紹，為使學生明白數位化產品設計與開發在現代產業中的重要性，課程重點將介紹出版編輯觀念之基礎認識，讓學生增進對數位出版流程的理解，在設計過程中兼顧學理介紹與實務應用。另外探討數位劇本之優點、特性、設計步驟與要領、講述策略、核心技術、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course is intended not only to familiarize students with the importance of digital products and development in the industry, but also to investigate the basic knowledge of editing and publishing. Students will have a combination of theoretical and practical training in this course.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.

description.zh: 本課程利用三學年四學期的時間，培養學生簡易法文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對法國文化的認識與興趣，提供學生法文的基礎知識（包括字母、讀音、語法等）。授課內容：1.個人（姓名、數字、身體重要部位、職業、年齡等），2.家庭（親屬稱謂、住宅式樣、個性、求學、介紹他人等），3.日常生活對話（打電話、道謝、道歉、討論天氣、討論日常活動、常用物品、約會、重要場所、用餐、提出邀請等）。
description.en: This is a French language course for beginners. By keeping their interests in study French, students are expected to have basic communicational skill, basic knowledge of French language (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understand French culture. This course contains: 1. Personal expression (names, numbers, body, occupation, age etc.) 2.Family (relatives, house, personality, studying, introduction etc.) 3.daily conversation (give a phone call, thanks, apologize, discussion about weather, Activities, dating, dining, invitation etc.)

description.zh: 中文課程共分四年三階段授課。 第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。 第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。 第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en: The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language. In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本課程由基本應力、應變分析等之介紹，進而介紹岩石的物理性質及其實驗方法，包括耐蝕性、耐凍性、力學性質(抗壓、抗拉、抗撓、抗剪、內磨擦角、凝聚力)、硬度、容積性質、靜態與動態彈性係數、潛變性。並介紹彈性破壞理論。
description.en: Introduction the stress and strain analysis etc..

description.zh: 本課程的內容在於提供經濟學的基本觀念及如何應用經濟學解決市場之問題。此外對於經濟相關的新議題，以及如何使用新方式來表達新想法及傳統議題會在課程中一並討論。詳細之議題則包括1.供給、需求及市場均衡。2.消費者及生產者的行為。3.市場結構。4.總體經濟議題。5.國內生產毛額及經濟成長。6.銀行體系。7.總體經濟政策。8.國際貿易及國際金融。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to learn basic concepts and theories of Economics and to apply economics to solve new problems and analyze new issues, ask new issues, formulate new ideas, and view old issues, in new ways. The topics of this course include 1.Supply, demand, and market equilibrium. 2.Consumer's behaviors and producer's behaviors. 3.Market structures. 4.Macroeconomic issues. 5.GDP and economic growth. 6.Banking system. 7. Macroeconomic policies. 8.International trade and international finance.

description.zh: 資源處理的主要對象為礦物，但其他有些固體與固體間或固體與液體間之分離與純化也包括在本工程之內，採用的方法：凡是各分離物間不同之物理及化學性質，皆可設法加以利用。本課程則針對其應用方法加以介紹，以期學生對資源處理有一初步及完整的認識。授課內容包括：粉粒體之簡介、篩及篩分、碎礦機之種類及應用、磨礦機之種類及應用、分級及分級機、重液選礦、浮游選礦、磁選機之種類及應用等。
description.en: Mineral processing uses various techniques to perform solid-solid and soild-liguid separation and concentration by using physical and chemical properties between different minerals. The separation and concentration methods include particle size analysis, screening, crushing, grinding, pulverizing, classification, heavy medium separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc.

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a particle, Kinetics of a particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
description.en: Fundamentals of structure and properties of carbon compounds. Emphasis on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, as well as chemical and spectroscopic methods of analysis.

description.zh: 以數學與物理的方法來探討化學之原理，物質之結構與性質，內容包括由氣體動力論衍導熱力學之基本定律，物理平衡（相平衡）、化學平衡、溶液論、電化學、反應動力學、量子力學、光譜學、表面現象、輸送性質等。
description.en: This course deals with the principle of chemistry, structure and properties of matter by the matter matical and physical methods. Topics include the kinetic theory of gases, basis laws of thermodgnamics, physical equilibria (phase equilibria ), chemical equilibria, solutions, electrochemistry, chemical kinetics, quantum mechanics, spectroscopy, surface phenomena and transport properties etc.

description.zh: 訓練學生以實驗技巧，探討理論，認識儀器，並對實驗結果之數據與現象做評析與處理。
description.en: This course is to train students by experimental techniques and the principles of physical chemistry, and to become familiar with laboratory apparatus. Both the phenomena and data results of experiments are explained and treated.

description.zh: 介紹化工程序中物質於一系統中流進、流出間質量、能量均衡之原理與計算，使學生學習列出質能均衡之基本式子並查尋相關文獻，手冊上所登錄之物性資料以解決問題。
description.en: The course introduces the material and energy balances of the chemical process.  Students learn to define the system, practice the conservation law of mass and energy, and look up handbook for necessary information.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

notes: 四化二甲乙丙合開，限55人

description.zh: 本課程介紹自然科學的起源、近代自然科學的誕生與發展。各領域含物理學、化學、生物學、天文學、數學等，並介紹各項科學技術。
description.en: This is an introductory course concerning about the origin of nature science, the genesis and developments of the modern physics science.  The topics of physics science are physics, chemistry, biology, astronomy, and mathematics.  The contents and characteristic of various technology are also discussed in this course.

notes: 四化二甲乙丙合開，限55人

For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。內容將繼續介紹複數分析及數值方法等章節，尤其對計算機的概念及演算法乃給予較多的強調，對實際問題亦有簡化討論。另外，在應用解決問題構想，練習例題及理論間，更有相輔相成的效果。至於線性規化，圖形組合，機率理論及數學機率等內容亦有概略介紹，務使同學有正確的認知。
description.en: The course*s main taget is to introduce math region which is relating to practical questions with simulate solution and interpretation, it applies the math method to engineering questions. The course content includes ordinary differential equation, linear algebra, vector calculus, Fourier analysis and partial differencial equation partial differential equation, with the aim to train students in establishing an exact perception to the meaning of theory, calculation and experimentation. it also introduces complex number analysis and numeric method, especially put more emphasis at the computer concept and algorithm, a simplified discussion to the practical problem as well. Besides, it has a mutual supporting effect in solving question concepts, practising model question and theory. As to the linear programming, graphs and combinatorial optimization, probability theory and mathmetical probability, this course also has a brief introduction, its target is to let all the students

description.zh: 材料之結晶構造及一般性質簡介，由簡單之單成份系，二成份系，到三成份系之平衡狀態圖，解釋各平衡狀態圖之相變態過程，並以顯微組織圖作輔助說明，由簡而繁，循序漸進，使同學容易領悟。
description.en: This course is to introduce Phase Diagrams and Microstructure.

description.zh: 材料之特性取決於材料內部組織，所以課程內容也注重內部組織與材料特性之間的關係，內部組織的變化對材料特性之影響，由理論為基礎之探討至實際之應用上。對本課程有關的基本概念，則詳加說明，初學材料者能得到材料上所必備之基本知識，若基本概念已有充分了解，則利用這些知識即可參考材料規格或手冊就可得到欲知之條件，進而以此概念作基礎，亦可研習更高深之學問，本課程內容著重於介紹材料之結構，基本原理有： 1. 金屬之基本理論，金屬及合金之構造，材料之組織，塑性加工變形之理論，材料之物理化學，機械性質及其實驗。 2. 鋼和鐵之製造，組織及其熱處理，變態理論。 3. 構造用鋼，合金鋼，工具鋼，特殊鋼之特性、用途及其熱處理方法。4. 鋼之表面硬化理論及其熱處理方法。 5. 鑄鐵之冶煉，種類及其熱處理方法。6.非鐵金屬材料，銅，鋁，鈦，鎂，錫，鋅，鉛，鎳等合金種類之特性及其處理方法。
description.en: The chacteristics of material depend on the inside tissue, therefore, the content alsoput more emphasis on the relationship between the inside tissue and material chacter-istics, how the change of inside tissue influences it in full details from the discussion of the theory basis to practical application. It has a detail description to the basic ideaof this course, the novice may get requisite fundamental knowledge. Once they fullyperceive these basic ideas, they may refer to material specification or manual to getthe conditions they request, or they may use these fundation to further exploreadvanced knowledge.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies the theory of thermaldynamics to calculate chemical potential energy and its equilibrium of condensed phase, released pressure and activated factors, solution thermaldynamics, complex metal solution , phase diagram and phase change, computer-aided phase reaction and phase diagram simulation, and planning a mathmatics model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 課程主要目標，是要使工程科系，發展出以簡單而合於邏輯的方式分析任何問題，並應用一些為大家熟悉的基本原理加以解答。本課程內容分成質點力學及剛體力學兩部分，剛體力學部分又分為靜力學及動力學。除介紹力學中的基本觀念及定理外更解釋及預測各種物理現象，進而打好工程應用的基礎。提供同學分析及設計各種機件和承載荷重結構的方法，課程內容將介紹某些依據基本定理而化簡的數學模式，進而分析及設計作用在結構上的各種條件，使同學在選擇或運用材料上有安全與正確的觀念，以便在理論與經驗的配合下，順利地處理材料在工程上所發生的問題。
description.en: The major target of this course is to let the engineering students develop and analyze any questions with an easy and logical way, and to try to solve them with some well-recognized fundamental principles. The course can be divided into particle dynamics and rigid body dynamics, the latter can be further divided into statics and dynamics. Apart from introducing the fundamental concept and law, it also explains and forecasts all kinds of nature physic phenomenon, in order to establish a good foundation for engineering application science. It provides methods for students to analyze and design all kinds of machine elements, bearing load structure as well, the course content will introduce some implified math models which are based on fundamental principles, and further analyze and design all conditions to the structure , let students have a safe and exact concept in choosing and utilizing materials, so that the theory and experience can be well matched, and the problems arisen from hand.

description.zh: 專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
description.en: It would be an extraordinary achievement if an endless creative professional skill can be matched with excellent management ability. This course is used to discuss the method of management or administration, that is to make a research in using the most effective approach to combine all the necessary production elements from the viewpoint of factory management class, so that the management objective can be reached. The current industry development, the initiative and policy of industry, and the culture background of this country all have to be matched with factory management strategy, thus, would become the best management once and for all.

description.zh: 介紹各種奈米結構材料：奈米碳管、奈米線、量子點、量子線和奈米複合材料的基本特性以及製備與應用技術，期能對奈米材料的物性、製造與應用有整體的認識。
description.en: This course will deal with the chemical and physical properties of nanomaterials. It will cover the preparation, structure, properties and applications of quantum dots and lines, carbon nanotubes, and nanocomposites.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程討論，化學中相關物理量的基本理論，技巧及應用等，特別是化學熱力學及電化學等。有關氣相，氣体定理，熱量，功，熱力學第一、第二及第三定律，焓，熵，自由能，相平衡，溶液，化學平衡，酸鹼，電化學，電極，電池，半反應等基礎理論之探討。
description.en: This course discuss the fundamental theory, technique and application with regards to physical property in chemistry, especially at the chemical thermal dynamics and electrical chemistry. The research of the fundamental theory about gaseous phase, the gas laws, heat, work, the first, second and third law of the thermodynatmics, entropy, enthalpy, free energy, phase equilbrium, solution, chemicalequilbrium, acid and alkali, electrical chemistry, electrode,electric cell,half reaction ,etc.

description.zh: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
description.en: This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.

description.zh: 傳授學生關於礦物與岩石的組成、結構、物化性質與觀察辨認等基本知識。內容包括：礦物的物理性質、礦物的化學性質、礦物的觀察(辨識與記錄)(自然元素礦物、硫化物礦物、氧化物與氫氧化物礦物、鹵化物礦物、碳酸鹽礦物、硫酸鹽礦物、單矽酸鹽與雙矽酸鹽礦物、環矽酸鹽與鏈矽酸鹽礦物、片矽酸鹽與體矽酸鹽礦物)、主要造岩礦物介紹、火成岩觀察(辨識與記錄)、沉積岩觀察(辨識與記錄)、變質岩觀察(辨識與記錄)、岩石礦物薄片製作與觀察等。
description.en: Introduce students about minerals and rocks composition, fabric, physical and chemical properties , observation and identify the basic knowledge. They include: physical properties of minerals, chemical properties of minerals ,minerals observed (identification and record) (Native elements minerals, Sulfides and Sulfosalts minerals, Oxides and Hydroxides minerals, Halides minerals, Carbonates minerals, Sulphates and Nitrates minerals, Nesosilicates and Sorosilicates minerals, Cyclosilicates and Inosilicates minerals, Phyllosilicates and Tectosilicates minerals), the main rock-forming minerals introduction, Igneous rocks observed (identification and record), Sedimentary rocks observed (identification and record), Metamorphic rocks observed (identification and record), rock and mineral thin section preparation and observation.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原 理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺 陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物 理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度 、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
description.en: This course is a basic topics of Materials Science.

description.zh: 本課程包括環境工程原理、廢棄物處理、資源回收、水污染防治、給水工程、廢水處理、空氣污染防制、噪音防制、土壤與地下水污染等之概述。
description.en: This course includes introduction of principle of environmental engineering, water supply, wastewater treatment, solid waste treatment, resource recycling, air pollution control, noise, soil and groundwater pollution.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 分別依歷史及關係、研究方向而分類基本性質。物質之基本構成原理。各以非金屬材料為主，輔以金屬材料，除以理論定義、性質、配試驗及計標來教授學習者研究瞭解如何鑑定選材適用，達到品質要求。
description.en: Physical,chemical,and molecular properties of materials commonly employed in civil engineering works.Influence of these properties on the performance and use of materials. Emphasis on laboratory evaluation of properties that control the performance of materials.

description.zh: 混凝土及其材料，磚石、木材、瀝青、鋼筋等土木工程材料各種性質之試驗方法，儀器之使用及實習。
description.en: Laboratory tests of concrete and its materials, Brick and stone,Wood,Asphalt,Reinforcing steel and other materials of Civil Engineering,Include test procedures,instrumentation,and interpretation of results.

description.zh: 本課程教授材料力學之基本理論及定理包含：(1)應力與應變、(2)抗拉試驗試驗與虎克定律、(3)扭矩、(4)剪力與彎矩、(5)梁之應力分析、(6)梁之撓度、(7)柱之挫屈 。
description.en: The contents of this course are listed as follows:1.Stress and Strain2.Mechanical Properties of Materials3.Torsion4.Pure Bending5.Traverse Loading6.Transformation of Stress and Strain7.Design and Deflections of Beam and Shahts8.Buckling of Columns9.Energy Methods

description.zh: 1.線性聯立微分方程2.向量分析3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en: This course deals with the following subjects:Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   Ⅱ.Laplace TnangformsⅢ.Vector AnalysisⅣ.Matrices and DeterminantsⅤ.Fourier SeriesⅥ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh: 本程在教授學生都市計劃中的一些基本理論，內容包括：(1)理論與實務之發展、(2)都市計劃之系統規劃、(3)土地使用、(4)交通運輸、(5)公共設施、(6住宅計劃、(7)都市更新 。
description.en: (1)Theory and Practice of Urban Developement Plan(2)Urban Planning Systemic Process(3)Land Use(4)Circulation(5)Public Facilities(6)Housing and Neighborhood Unit(7)Urban Renewal

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧推估並了解不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
description.en: Economics can be said to be satisfaction of wants by the allocation of scarce factors. Construction economy introduces various methods of financial cash flow to analyze the priority of infrastructures. Moreover, it provides a systematic framework for evaluating the economic aspects of competing design solutions.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 介紹一階常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，及解非均勻方程式的一般方法，以及Bessel與 Strum Liouville 問題,並介紹 Laplace轉換與數值分析。
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering, physics, and mathematics to those areas of mathematics which are most important in connection with practical problems.  The contents are Ordinary Differential Equations, Linear Algebra, Fourier Analysis, and Numerical Methods.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
description.en: The aim of this course is to educate students to think independently about organic chemistry. The course is divided into three parts;introductory material(concepts of structure and bonding);organic reactions and mechanism(sigma-bond chemistry followed by  pi-bond chemistry);and topics of more specialized interest.

description.zh: 使學生對工程力學原理之理論與應用具有清晰、完整的概念。內容涵蓋：基本觀念，力系的平衡、摩擦、慣性矩和慣性積，質點的運動學與動力學，應力和應變，扭矩、彎力矩、樑的撓曲。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to provide the student with a clear and thorough presention of the theory and application of engineering mechanics.  The text contains general principles, equilibrium of force system, friction, moments of inertia, kinetics and dynamics of a particle, stress and strain, torsion, bending moment and bending of beam.

name.en: Textile materials and principles of textile Technology

description.zh: 1. 本課程主要說明各種紡織材料之組成和成形, 基本性質, 各種加工與應用。 2. 本課程主要簡介紡織科技所包含之原料與製程, 製品和評估，同時訓練學生了解基本的紡織辭彙。
description.en: 1. Introduction to textile compositions, properties, spinning, processings and applications. 2. Textile materials and related processes are introduced, and technical used are learned as well.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物大分子及構成這些生物分子的基本分子。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA、脂質、糖類結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。構成蛋白質的二十種氨基酸和組成DNA或RNA的四個核甘酸及構成脂質、糖類結構的生物分子將詳細被探討。
description.en: This course is to introduce a serials of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The characters of 20 amino acids and 4 nucleotides will be studied in detail. Carbohydrates and lipids are learned by their specific functions.

notes: 二上沒選修生化，二下不能選修生化實驗

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en: 1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order3.Laplace transforms4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
description.en: To build the quantitative logic thinking about the decision problems. The course is designed to introduce the fundamental techniques and methods of operations research. The related software will be utilized to aid in building and solving models. The topics to be covered: linear programming, what-if analysis, dual theory, transportation and assignment.

description.zh: 本課程針對電腦初學者所設計，課程依照初學者最需要的電腦入門知識和技能，從基本的網路原理及、網路資源教起，讓同學可以充份掌握並利用並利用網路資源。本課程亦教授網頁編輯觀念教您如何規劃網站架構、再加上互動式表單及動態網頁效果的完整說明,讓同學也能製作出具有專業水準的網站。本課程分為「電腦基礎」和「網際網路」等二部份：(1) 電腦基礎篇：介紹最熱門的網路觀念與操作技巧，內容涵括知識性的網路相關知識，包括網路與Internet發展，以及資訊安全等題材；另外還有操作性的課題，包括WWW與網路搜尋、E-mail電子郵件、HTML網頁製作、FTP檔案傳輸與網站發佈等；學會上網找資料、收發電子郵件、使用即時通訊軟體。(2) 網際網路篇：學會製作個人網頁等技巧。製作網頁以FrontPage中文版的各項基本功能為主，內容包括網站的建立、圖文網頁編輯、表格與超連結、導覽列與共用邊框、分割框架與多媒體互動網頁設計，以及網站的發佈與管理等，讓同學可以完整學習利用FrontPage來編製網頁的編輯技巧。
description.en: This course is designed for the students who want to handle the resource of internet. The is course composed of two parts:（1）The concept of internet and the application program（2）Learning how to build up the website by using Microsoft FrontPage.
