description.zh: 這個課程設計的目的，在於讓學生熟悉專業人員應具備的相關倫理與法律議題，學生不僅將重新思索在專業職涯與生活中倫理所扮演的主要角色，並且探索專業人員在面對道德與人際關係兩難時的倫理運用與法律原則。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to make students re-think the main character between professional jobs and living ethics, and discover the principles of ethics and laws when the professional faces the dilemma of morality and interpersonal relationship.

name.zh: 國際專業證照研訓實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本「國際專業證照研訓實務講座」課程針對國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。本學期專門培訓學生通過Microsoft 國際證照之Word 與Excel為目標，以協助同學建立跨領域與國際化能力之專長。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of international professional licenses in management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation. This semester will help students to pass the licenses of Word and Excel, and further to obtain the interdisciplinary expertise with international capabilities.

notes: 四資財二與最後一哩合開；計網電腦教室，限60人

name.zh: 財經專業證照實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of Finance and Economic Professional Certification

description.zh: 為加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本財經專業證照實務講座，針對金融市場常識與職業道德、普通證券商業務員、理財規劃人員等專業證照開設輔導課程，希望學生能夠學習基本的金融市場常識與金融從業人員應具備的職業道德，並進一步瞭解理財的流程，同時就個人或家庭的收支、儲蓄、住屋、子女教育、以及退休生活等規劃皆予明確分析，並舉實際案例詳予說明並闡釋各種相關理財金融機構之角色與功能，逐一介紹各類理財工具之特性及其有效之運用方法。對於未來有志從事金融機構財富管理業務之從業人員及大學校院相關系所學生，極適合作為其日常業務之參考、進修或準備應試之用。俾培育學生參加並通過國內外財經專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of professional licenses in finance and economics, nurture students to participate in professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate finance and economics professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 四資財二與最後一哩合開，限100人

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts and approaches of systems analysis including systems analysis, systems design, systems establishment, and systems evaluation and testing.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業(工業)相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之套特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1.The Characters of business laws. 2.The presentment of civil code. 3.The business registration laws and business laws. 4.The insurance laws.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討效率市場假說下的異常現象，本課程以文獻討論為主，並且用心理學的理論來加以解釋投資人在金融市場的行為模式。
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence of the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged in the past two decades. Behavioural finance has developed as an approach to try to explain financial market anomalies from the EMH. The aim of this course is to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的創新工具或取更好的工作機會
description.en: Course Descriptions: Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their  entrepreneurial approaches to innovation.Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。在台灣，擁有十個以上員工的公司有86%有自屬的企業網站，而擁有自屬網站的頁有近七成聘僱網頁設計師進駐公司任職，面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

notes: 電腦教室；工管與最後一哩合開(須先修過商業網站設計)

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務性訓練Pro/ENGINEER系統之操作能力，輔以幾何模型學理論說明CAD技術的發展現況。首先介紹CAD概論，說明電腦輔助設計技術的趨勢，培養學生具備現代數位產品開發概念與同步工程之意義；然後教授Pro/ENGINEER系統的各部分功能、指令操作，並以設計專題引導學生建立實務應用，強化學生的操作與應用能力。
description.en: Introduction of the fundamental of 3D CAD technology and the manipulation of the software packages, Pro/ENGINEER, for product design in a concurrent engineering environment. By the practical projects, the students are trained more adept skill and application experience.

notes: 四創意三與四設三合開(產品組)

description.zh: 實際演練室內設計工程中由生活需求分析及調查,規劃設立,施工,協調,管理等各種活動.並綜合性掌握環境中各種條件以習得室內設計的手法.
description.en: The Course is divided into five units: 1). The Nineteenth Century: The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). Foundation of Modernism (1890-1920) : In this period, the art community, including Cubism, Expressionism, De Stijl, Futurism and Constructivism, greatly influenced the form of building. 3).Modernism(1920-1970) : In this period, emphasises were placed on the "Less is More" , historicism and ornament were abandoned, the replacement were form and function, reason and abstraction. 4).Postmodernism (1965-1989) : Postmodernism architecture is characterized by the idea of "Less is Boring", and was inspired by Classical tradition and historical precedents. 5).Contemporary Pluralism : In the latter part of the twentieth century, an architect doesn't want to be associated with a movement, unle

notes: 四創意三與四設三合開(家室組)

description.zh: 速寫是最古老、最容易、最快速的溝通方式之一，也是充滿希望的設計師及藝術家必備的絕技。藉由大量的植物寫生，提昇觀察能力並把線條練活，進而建立起掌控「形」的基本信心。接下來的靜物寫生著重整體的構圖關係，利用黑白灰的構圖原理，著眼在傳其「神」而不是傳其「形」。將前階段的單線練習，改作分塊、分面的線群練習。再接下來是人物肖像寫生練習。到此，線條的特質、比例的嚴謹皆要掌控，肖像對象的性別、年齡、特徵以及由內在而外顯的神韻，是畫者所要表達的。
description.en: Sketching is one of the oldest, easiest and quickest methods of communication and also one of the most important skills a hopeful designer and artist must master. The course begins with a lot of plants sketching that helps to enhance your observation and build up your confidence in mastering forms and shapes in order to make your sketches vivid. Next still life sketching focuses on the composition. You are encouraged to utilize the composition principle of black, white and gray, and emphasize more on the vividness than the form until you get rid of the habit of passive copying of the objects. Then you move from the previous linear sketching practice into facet sketching and then block sketching. At the end of the semester, you will practice human portrait sketching. Until now you should be able to handle not only the characteristics of the line and proportion, but also the gender, age, charm and expression of the model.

notes: 四創意三與四設二三四合開，限60人

description.zh: 本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to important architectural thoughts, events and projects after 1900, except for the heyday of modernism. From metabolism to blobitecture, each week a lecture referring to one specific topic including relevant materials will be given.

notes: 四創意三與四建三合開(建築)

description.zh: 一、 本課程目的在使同學認識與了解台灣傳統建築歷史、文化、技術之精髓所在，進而增進建築設計運用傳統建築思想與素材之能力。二、 講述內容包括台灣史前、原住民、荷西、明鄭、清代與近現代等建築之形成與型態變遷過程。三、 講述方式以幻燈片介紹為主，學期中並安排兩次實地參訪。
description.en: 1. This course is based on the belief that： to recognized and understanding of the historical 、culture and technique in the Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 2. The scope of the course are include the styles and changes in prehistorically period, aboriginal, Dutch colonialist, Ch'ing Dynasty and contemporary Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 3. The methods of the course are slides shows and to visit the historical sites

notes: 四創意三與四建三合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程講授並實際演練針對建築設計領域中的先端數位實務技術，以增進學習者的設計操作能力及表現力。
description.en: This course offers students hands-on exercises on various advanced digital practices that have become essential in the architectural design discipline, intending to prepare students properly their ability to execute these techniques.

notes: 四創意三與四建三合開(建築)

description.zh: 目前建築工程營建產業多賴以圖文資料溝通，文件易有失誤，會提高成本、工期延長、甚至於爭議之狀況。BIM 工具之運用，可有效提升營建產業生產力。各國政府已紛紛推出 BIM 的審照制度，我國近年來於公共工程招標已要求BIM技術之整合運用。本課程針對BIM運用於建築生命週期中各產業間的介紹及效益、實例分享，並於課程中指導同學針對BIM軟體基礎工具使用。
description.en: Architectural engineering construction industry on which 2D graphic data communication, the file is easy to form mistakes, will increase the cost of the extension of time, even controversial situation. The use of Building Information Modeling (BIM) software tools, which can effectively enhance the productivity of the construction industry. Governments around the world have now launched the BIM audit system.In recent years, Taiwan has asked the public works bidding integrate and use of BIM technology. This course focuses on the introduction and effective life cycle of BIM for architectural industry, examples of sharing.  Guidance to students in courses based tool for BIM software.

notes: 四創意三與四建三合開(建築)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education
Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 以工業設計的工作領域為範圍，藉由個案討論方式使學生熟練設計管理中有關方針之形成、計劃、聯繫、監督、評價、形象策略與控制、再教育、人事管理及合約等技術,設計的組織雖與決策，設計過程之管理，設計政策與產品策略之訂定，溝通技巧及設計之法律問題。。
description.en: This courses contents identifies specific topic areas: Nature of Design Work and its management, Quality by Design, Design in a Business Context, Legal Aspects of Design, Design Policy Making.

notes: 四創意四與四設四合開(產品組)

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解一般都市計畫的主要內容，同時針對台灣現行都市計畫的有關組織體系、實務作業與現況問題作有系統的探討。授課主題涵蓋：1.台灣空間規劃的階層體系、2.都市計畫組織體系與功能、3.台灣都市計畫的發展沿革、4.都市規劃的程序、內容與方法、5.規劃資料的搜集、調查與分析、6.土地使用計畫、7.交通計畫、8.公共設施計畫、9.都市更新、10.都市計畫未來的發展趨勢、11.實際案例分析、研討。

notes: 四創意四與四建四合開(建築)

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

notes: 四創意四與四建四合開(建築)

description.zh: 以專題研究方式訓練學生獨立企劃,分析,評斷,歸納及創新思考的能力.並藉由對生活型態,生活行為,生活需求,家具與室內空間相關性等問題之深入探討,實際演練設計之過程及熟練家具與室內設計之手法.
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

name.zh: 室內設計與裝修證照概論
name.en: License of Interior Design and Decoration

description.zh: 整合學科與術科兩大部分，本課程介紹【建築物室內設計】與【建築物室內裝修工程管理】專業技能檢定事宜。參酌最新專業議題並研習歷屆考試題庫，課程加強學／術科模擬考試訓練，期使學校養成教育與設計界之專業需求得以結合。
description.en: Integrating the Knowledge and Technology parts of the Interior design profession, the course introduces the practice of National Skill Test of Interior design and Project Management. Concerning not just the updated ideas and the historical questions, it stresses also the intensive stimulated test so as to link the educational achievement and the professional expectation.

notes: 四創意四與四設四合開(家室組)

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在教導學生對都市空間的體驗與涵構的認知，並使學生具備都市設計之基本能力與相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--主要探討都市的涵構含實質元素、自然環境及人文向度。2.在理論上--主要探討都市構成的空間基礎理論如圖地、連接及場所理論。3.在方法上--從社區居民的經營、都市設計程序的討論以至多元設計程序法之應用。4.在實務上--以台北市及高雄新市鎮為例，研討相關案例並讀設計準則之意含。

notes: 四創意四與四建四、職二建五合開(建築)

name.en: Operation and Management of Real Estate

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為提供學生瞭解不動產開發案相關之理論基礎及實務經驗。不動產經營所涉及的領域甚廣，因此課程內容安排著重實務討論及法令解說，藉由案例分享瞭解地方政府落實開發建設可能涉及的資源課題與對策，例如容積獎勵、稅賦減免、都市計畫變更及容積移轉等；另外開發案財務分析導論及比較，讓學生可以系統性的認識各種類型不動產開發案之收益、稅制、規劃限制及風險等，除了增加實務的認識，對於個人理財亦有幫助。課程內容包含1.基礎財務分析、2.不動產相關法令解說、3.不動產產品規劃及銷售實務、4.不動產開發流程及實務、5.產業創新案例分享、6.產業政策與方向及7.實際案例參訪等。
description.en: The course provides both theoretical and pragmatic knowledge in real estate management. Course contents emphasize on practical recitations and codes commentaries. Factors such as area-allowanced incentives, tax reductions, amendments in city planning, and transfer area allowance are addressed in each case study. In addition, financial benefits, tax regulations, design constraints, and risk assessment in development different types are presented in systematic manner thru the course. Course topics include: 1. Fundamental financial analyses. 2. Real estate regulations and codes. 3. Real estate planning and marketing. 4. Procedures in real estate development. 5. Innovations in practice. 6. Real estate policy. 7. Visitation in projects.

notes: 四創意四與四建四合開(建築)

name.en: Special Integration Topics on Technology in Cultural and Creative Industry

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討如何整合科技於文化創意產業，透過案例教學，幫助學生結合有效率的資訊科技工具於人文藝術，以發展文化創意產業，並創造高附加價值的效益。當今產、官、學、研都強調跨域整合的重要性，文創與互動科技的結合，能為文化創意作加值，並注入新生命、新體驗，因此，文創遇到科技後，所激盪出的火花與創意，已逐漸受到產、學界的青睞。本課程將探討文化創意的發展脈絡、文創的底蘊與其應用面、互動科技的應用，透過文獻研讀、案例分析等方式，瞭解國外最新研究與趨勢，討論文創與科技的創新應用可行性，引領文化創意產業轉型，規劃未來文創與科技整合的新契機。
description.en: The course intends to explore about how to integrate the technology into the cultural and creative Industries. Through case study, it will help students to combine efficient information technology tools in the field of arts and humanities, and also facilitate the development of cultural and creative industries, and create high value-added benefits for these industries. Today's industry, government, academia, research has emphasized the importance of cross-discipline consolidation. It means that cultural creation and interactive technology combined with value-added as a bonus for the cultural creation, and implant new life, new experiences. Therefore, when the cultural creation encounter technology, which bring out the spark and creativity, has gradually been favored both with industry  and academia. This course will explore the cultural creative context, cultural inside information and its application, the interactive technology application by using the method of literature review, cas

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 講授電腦輔助造型設計之繪圖技巧，以Alias軟體之3D曲面特性，講解進階曲面繪圖技巧和複雜曲面之繪製與編修，產品彩現之材質表現技巧與變化，打光技巧與渲染等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided modeling design，teach students how to use Alias software building conceptual product models and complex surface，product rendering skill in material performance、color and lighting.

description.zh: 講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 學習廣告設計與與包裝設計的實務能力。每位學生須完成可收錄於個人作品集之(1)文化創意產業相關之文宣廣告設計、(2)產品或食品類之創意包裝設計，及(3)授課教師指定之其它作業，共至少三件作品。
description.en: This course aims to help students to develop skills on advertisement and package design. Assignments include design projects of (1) cultural and creative product, (2) package, with high quality to be collected in students’ design portfolios.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：審計及會計專業、AICPA Top10 Technologies、AIS research methods、IT technologies、查核規劃、Risk analysis、Security management、內部控制結構等。本課程將介紹的主題如下： ◆會計資訊系統之重要性和意義 ◆會計資訊系統與內外環境的關係 ◆資料處理作業程序中的五大功能 ◆內部控制與會計資系統 ◆資訊系統的工具與技術 ◆系統開發 ◆資料庫管理 ◆會計實務軟體的介紹與操作 ◆介紹有關AIS研究之分類及內容。 ◆新興的AIS研究課題及資訊應用。
description.en: Accounting information systems courses will provide the discussion on the areas of auditing and accounting profession, AICPA Top10 Technologies, AIS research methods, IT technologies, Risk analysis, Security management and Internal control, etc. In completing this course, the student's objectives will be ... 1. To develop an awareness of recent developments in accounting information systems technology. 2. To become familiar with, and gain research interests in the continuous auditing, accounting information systems and recently development of CAATs. 3. To become aware of the relationship between accounting information systems and the other subsystems that comprise management information systems, and to understand the role of accountants as designers, users, and evaluators of information systems. To gain experience working successfully in group settings.

description.zh: 本課程能讓學生了解雲端服務之相關管理議題.研究議題包含三類(Saas, Paas,及Iaas)雲端服務之營運模式、公有雲及私有雲、雲端創新服務應用、資安議題, 雲端服務成功關鍵因素、及國內外案例等
description.en: This course will cover related study issues about clouding service. The research issues include three clouding service operation models (Saas, Paas, and Iaas), public clouding and private clouding, innovation service application, security management issues, the successful key factors of clouding service, and case study.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生坡地開發建設所需具備之相關知識，課程的內容主要的是承續坡地計畫的相關主題，但以從事實務工作所需之內容為主。授課主題涵蓋：1.基地調查與分析（包括自然與生態環境）2.基地開發之工程 3.基地開發之成本分析 4.環境影響評估 5.基地開發之相關法規 6.案例分析。
description.en: The course is intended to train the students to be able to establish a safe and high-quality hillside buildings. The primary contents include(1) influential factors of hillside environment, (2) planning and design stage strategic,(3) construction process, (4) maintenance works, and (5) regulation

description.zh: 主要針對各種機能空間之室內設計規劃整體操作流程，透過實列介紹，瞭解實際施工圖如何繪製並論及施工現場施做問題解析。並介紹各種風格式樣之潮流趨勢之建材選用與整合室內色彩、照明、家具及設備等。
description.en: The course focuses on the overall practice procedure of interior planning and design in terms of various spaces. It covers the construction drawing method and the analysis of practical problems with some appropriate cases. Scores of style trends in materials and how they can be consistent with color, lighting, and equipment would also be introduced.

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

notes: 建都所與建都所與在職專班合開

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

name.zh: 創新創業智財法律專題研究
name.en: Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Intellectual Property Law

description.zh: 本課程呼應技職再造的創新創業趨勢，以具體個案討論為中心，讓同學有機會運用所學、解決實際的法律問題。適合對如何透過智財法律推動知識經濟、創新創業有興趣的同學。同學可以透過本課程，進一步了解創新創業現實中可能面臨的問題、並練習提供解決策略。
description.en: This course will focus on the intellectual property legal issues regarding innovation and entrepreneurship by drawing real cases for analysis and discussion. Students will have opportunities to further understand the legal practice in IP area by taking part in solving real cases with the help of the course tutor. It is recommended for those who are equipped with a general understanding of IP laws or are strongly interested in this subject.

notes: 智財所與智財所在職專班合開

description.zh: 著作權法係為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，所特別制定之法律。該法所稱著作包括：語文著作、音樂著作、戲劇、舞蹈著作、美術著作、攝影著作、圖形著作、視聽著作、錄音著作、建築著作、電腦程式著作等。著作權的保障內涵則包含因著作完成所生之著作人格權及著作財產權。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於著作權的瞭解。
description.en: Copyright Act  is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. "Works" of this act, include the following:1.Oral and literary works.2.Musical works.3.Dramatic and choreographic works.4.Artistic works.5.Photographic works.6.Pictorial and graphical works.7.Audiovisual works.8.Sound recordings.9.Architectural works.10.Computer programs. "Copyright" means the moral rights and economic rights subsisting in a completed work.　The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

notes: 科法學程與最後一哩合開，限25人，有1場參訪

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長案。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the allowable subjects for patent, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 民法總則介紹民法中的共通概念與基本原則，為整部民法以及所有法律的學習基礎。透過民法總則之學習，同學可以熟悉法律的思考模式及規範架構。本課程將以理論與實務並重方式協助同學學習。
description.en: The General Principle of the Civil Law serves to introduce the common concept and fundamental principle of the Civil Law.  In short, the General Principle of the Civil Law predominates as a learning basis for the whole Civil Law and all legal study.  Through learning on the General Principle of the Civil Law, students can be familiar with the model of legal thought and the framework of norm.  This course aims to assist students learning from both theory and practice.

description.zh: 以講授刑法基本概念的犯罪論、罪數論及刑罰論為主軸；並輔以相關案例的檢討、分析，以使同學對於抽象的概念及學理，得以理解及適用。目的除在強化同學對維護個人、社會、國家等法益的體認外，亦在奠定學習刑法各論的基礎。
description.en: The course focuses on the introduction to the fundamental ideas of the criminal law such as the criminal theory, crime arithmetic and punishment theory. Many relevant cases are presented in the class for further discussion and analysis. The ultimate objective of the course is not only to enhance the students a deeper understanding of the rights granted to individuals, society and nations, but also to equip them with a wider knowledge base ready for a further studying on each specific section of the Criminal Law.

description.zh: 本課主要講授民法第二編債篇的規定。債篇包括契約法和侵權行為法。相關的法律理論都會被介紹。學生將被指定閱讀教科書和法院判決。課堂參與是必要的。
description.en: This course teaches the rules of the second chapter of Civil Code. The second chapter covers contract law and torts. Relevant legal doctrines are introduced. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使學生了解，要想做一個優良的教師，必須知道先要充實自己，除了不斷的充實專門的知識和技能以外，應多學習些教育的理論和方法，試著利用理論以指導經驗，並從實際經驗中去驗證理論。一個剛從學校畢業出來的教師，要儘量利用教育專業的知識和技能，努力學習做好教學的工作。例如要知道如何去組織、分析、調整、和補充教材，如何去設計教學活動，如何練習活用教法及教學技術，如何提高學生的學習興趣，如何養成學生之良好的學習習慣，如何加強常規的訓練和教室的管理，如何和諧教室的氣氛，和何進行教學的評鑑等，都是教師應當研究改進的重要課題。在實際工作中去尋求學理的根據;並以理論去指導工作的進行，如此日就月將，自會增進教學的效果。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了

(b) have good teaching theory and method (c) know how to make the curriculum better.(d) how to design teaching activity (e) how to use the teaching method and technique (f) how to motivate students (g) how to let students have good learning hobby (h) how to increase the training and class management ( i ) how to keep the atmosphere well in classroom.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生瞭解教育與社會關係，從而能自教育的社會基礎理論觀點來從事教育決策，分析教育制度，探求教學原則，解決教育問題。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the students the understanding of the relationship between education and society. It presents the students with the relation between education and the main sociological theories, such as socialization, social structure, social change. It also offer students with the social condition of schools, the teacher*s role, the teacher groups and the teacher*s social status. After finishing this course, the students can use the knowledge learned from this course to make educational decision, analyze educational systems, study the instructional principles and solve educational problems in view of the basic theories of sociology of education, and thus lead to achieve the educational goal.

It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

description.zh: 我們的事業甚至人生成功與否，不是建立在我們獲得與貢獻多少，而是在獲得與付出的過程中，我們是否樂在其中。能否在此過程中進行創意性思考，無疑是決定我們是否樂在其中的關鍵。本課程至少包括下述和「創意思考」相關的課題：它的神經科學基礎，它的心理學方法，它在哲學與邏輯上的認識論基礎，如何培養創意思考的基因，如何區別個人進行與在團體中運用創意思考，等等。本課程將進行系列的理論與個案探討，使學習者不僅知道什麼是「創意思考」，更要能夠進行創意思考。
description.en: Whether our careers and even our lives are successful or not is contingent not just upon the results we produce, but also upon whether we enjoy the activity of achieving those results.  To achieve this goal, we need to be able to think creatively.  The course hence covers at least the following topics relevant to “Creative Thinking”: its neuroscientific basis, its psychological methods, the epistemic foundation in both philosophy and logic, the development of the gene of creative thinking, the difference between thinking creatively as an individual and in a group, etc.  The course will proceed with a series of close studies of theories and practical cases, so that the participants of the course will not only know 'what is creative thinking', but also be able to think creatively.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹句子結構的研究，引導學生對語法形式有更深層的瞭解，包含各種描述性或理論性的分析方法。學生可透過這門課獲得以下的訓練：一、熟悉句法學的核心概念，如合法度、語法範疇（如名詞、動詞、副詞、介詞）、語法關係（如主語、賓語、狀語）、詞組結構（如中心語、補述語、指示語）、語意角色（如主事、受事，歷事）、移位運作（如疑問、被動）。二、培養分析英語基本句型的能力，如限定與非限定子句、簡單、並列與複合句式、主動與被動語態、直述、祈使、疑問與感嘆句型，以及分屬各類語法範疇的附屬子句（如名詞子句、形容詞子句、副詞子句）。三、以「衍生理論」的架構為主軸，對現代句法理論以及句法分析的基本原則建立初步的認識。四、透過實際語料的解析，應用上述的知識與能力。
description.en: This course provides an introduction to the study of sentence structures. It directs students to progress to a deeper understanding of grammatical constructions, including various descriptive and theoretical approaches to representing them. By the end of this course, students will have1. 	become familiar with the core concepts of syntax, such as grammaticality, grammatical categories (e.g. nouns, verbs, adverbs, and prepositions), grammatical relations (e.g. subjects, objects, and adjuncts), constituent structures (e.g. heads, complements, and specifies), semantic roles (e.g. agent, themes, and experiencers), and movement operations (e.g. interrogation and passivization).2.	developed an ability to analyze the primary sentence structures of English, such as finite and non-finite clauses, simple, compound, and complex sentences, active and passive voices, declarative, imperative, interrogative, and exclamative sentence types, and embedded clauses belonging to distinct grammatical cat

name.zh: 全球化中的英語語用學
name.en: English Pragmatics in the Era of Globalization

description.zh: 在此全球化之際，一種文化所發出的訊息很可能得從另一種文化來解讀，其間需要對於情境、語境、社會文化背景的熟悉與高度認知，通過這種高度認知方能瞭解整體篇章的意義。由於英文是國際企業的通用語言，因此現今全世界的英文教育都在戮力納入全球組織語言的系統性探討。此課程目標在於討論英語語用學在傳播與企業等領域的可能應用，同時培養思辯能力。此課程可能包含的議題如下： 	道地英語/文對於英文學習在語言及文化上的挑戰 	英語媒體和企業語言中的隱約/間接/譬喻表達用法 	社會文化經驗與事件交互作用下的情境語感及意義變化 	英語社會中新型態媒體的實際與象徵層面 	資訊廣告類型如何合併資訊與說服以達意圖效果 	跨文化情境中語用模式的策略契合與積極修飾 	多國企業之多重語言/文化團隊所亟需之溝通技巧
description.en: In the wake of globalization, a message encoded in one culture may have to be decoded in the other, which entails the ability of making sense of a discourse through a strong awareness of language pragmatics in contextualization. English as the language for international communication has made English education worldwide strive to incorporate a systematic exploration of global organizational language. This course aims to address the potential applications of English pragmatics to fields such as media and business and simultaneously develop awareness for critical thinking, which may include the following topics:  	The linguistic and cultural challenges of naturally-occurring English to EFL comprehension; 	The covert/indirect/figurative use of expressions in English-language media and corporate discourses;  	The contextual senses and variations in meaning of a discourse based on the matrix of sociocultural experiences and occurrences; 	The pragmatic and symbolic dimensions in the

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 本課程介紹水文地質的一般原理、概念和分析方法及地下水在實用上的一些問題。主要內容有: 水的來、源分、佈與循環、地下水的賦存、地下水的物理性質及化學成分、地下水運動的基本規律、地下的地質作用、地下水的補給、排泄與徑流、地下水資源概況，與地下水有關的環境問題，地下水與工程開發的工程地質問題，水文地質調查概要等。
description.en: The content of this class includes general principles, concepts of hydrological geology and analyzing methods for practical problem related to this subject. It includes: origin of water, distribution and circulation, reserve of underground water, physical and chemical properties of underground water and the relationship between hydrology and engineering geology.  It also discuss environmental concerns of engineering to the hydrology system.

description.zh: 由於工業發展帶來了各種環境的污染，使自然生態遭到破壞，人類健康受到傷害。本課程為分析汙染原因，並探討如何減輕污染源，以期學習者了解事前防範及事後補救之對策。
description.en: Introduction the methods of environmental protection.

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 介紹各種空氣污染現象和議題、探討其成因、對人類與環境的影響、各種空氣污染物之防制技術和其原理、國內外對空氣污染管制之策略與相關法規，最後再特別針對資源開採過程所引發的空氣污染及其防制提供案例說明。本課程乃介紹空氣污染物特性及控制程序、環保法令之課程，以期讓各位同學對空氣污染成因、防制技術及國內外管制政策與法令有基本認識，同時對各位未來繼續研究與就業有所幫助。
description.en: A lots of air pollution are global concern issues in the world. Understanding of air pollution control and health problems, risk assessment, and global atmospheric changes are getting important to everyone.This lecture will introduce sources and impacts of air pollution problems, basic meteorological processes, air quality modeling, air quality measurement/monitoring methods, air pollution control technologies, and relevant air pollution regulations. Finally, this lecture will provide some air pollution control cases focused on mineral mining industries and processes.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 課程綱要：1.半導體元件簡介2.物理氣相沉積3.化學氣相沉積4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline：1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device2.Physical Vapor Deposition3.Chemical Vapor Deposition4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 塑性加工係藉塑性變形將金屬材料變化成目的形狀之金屬加工法。本課程包含：金屬塑性變形之基礎，塑性力學之基礎及各種塑性加工法之介紹，最近之塑性加工技術的進步，並涉及與塑性加工關連之成形技術及適合各種塑性加工材料之選擇。
description.en: Plastic deformation processing is a metal processing method which based on plastic deformation to transform metal material into objective shape. This course includes the foundation of metal plastic deformation, the foundation of plastic dynamics, and the introduction of all kinds of plastic deformative processing methods. The recent technology development of plastic deformation processing is related to formation technique and suitable for alternatives to all kinds of plastic deformation materials.

description.zh: 本門課目標在讓修課學生能瞭解真空的基本概念、真空技術的應用、真空幫浦的種類與操作原理、真空計的基礎原理、真空系統之操作等。第一部分將介紹真空的基本概念，並以說明真空技術在材料及其他領域之應用，包含真空感應熔煉、真空燒結、真空熱處理、蒸鍍、濺鍍等。第二部分將解釋真空邦浦之種類及原理，包含機械邦浦、魯式邦浦、擴散邦浦、渦輪分子邦浦、離子邦浦等。第三部分將說明真空計的種類及原理，包含電容真空計、熱傳導真空計、轉球黏滯真空計、離子真空計等。第四部分將介紹真空系統之架構，並說明如何藉由真空系統獲得低真空、中真空、高真空及超高真空等不同程度之真空。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to introduce the basic concepts of vacuum, the various applications of vacuum technology, the types and principles of vacuum pumps, the fundamentals of vacuum gauges, and the operation of vacuum systems.    The first part will introduce the fundamental of vacuum and its application in the material and other fields, including vacuum induction melting, vacuum sintering, vacuum heat treatment, evaporation, sputtering, etc. The second part will explain the types and principles of vacuum pumps, including mechanical pump, roots pump, diffusion pump, turbomolecular pump, ion pump, etc. The third part will demonstrate the types and principles of vacuum gauges, including capacitance gauge, thermal conductivity gauge, spinning rotor gauge, ion gauge, etc. The fourth part will introduce the vacuum systems and illustrate how to get low vacuum, medium vacuum, high vacuum, and ultrahigh vacuum.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、鑽石、電子束、離子束、電漿、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，由冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結機械另件、燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過冶金課程的學生，能進一步對製造技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: Introduction to manufacturing processes, and introducing newest manufacturing technology. Applying physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials,

description.zh: 具有半流體特性的粉體，其在產業上之應用範圍相當地廣，可說是涵蓋了所有的產業。其中在礦業、窯業、陶瓷業、水泥業、冶金業等工業與粉體工程有密切關係。所以，研習本課程主要的目的是讓學生對錯綜複雜的粉體問題，能有基本上的認識與了解。本課程安排的內容包括：粉粒體的定義、粉體之生成、粉體之構造與特性、粉體的物性、粉體的分離、混合、貯藏、輸送、計測與工業安全衛生等項目。
description.en: With the characteristics of semi-fluid, powder has a wide variety of applications,it covers all industries. Among of them, mineral, kiln, ceramics, cement, metallurgyindustry have a very close relationship with powder industry. Therefore, the majorpurpose of this course is to let student have basic perception and understanding tothe complex powder problems.The content of this course includes the definitionof powder body, the formation of powder body, the structure and characteristicsof powder body, the property of powder body, the separation, mixting, storage,transportation and measurement of powder body, and industry safety and sanitation.

description.zh: 本課程主要在提供學生有關計算機系統之基本知識及應用。授課內容包括：1.電腦的演進  2 .電腦的硬體架構(內部組件、中央處理機及主記憶體、輸出入裝置、資料儲存媒介與裝置)  3. 電腦的軟體(電腦系統概述、作業系統、資料組織與檔案處理、程式語言簡介、程式設計與軟體開發、資訊系統設計與發展程序)  4.計算機的應用。
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers, including, 1.the evolution of  computers, 2.computer hardware structure , 3.computer software & applications.

notes: 計網電腦教室，限25人；限工程學士班補修

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧，推估並了解                                         不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
description.en: Introduction the methods of engineering cost calculate.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論1.1陶瓷產品1.2陶瓷製程特色1.3目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固. 液 氣三相反應　2.1三相反應2.2乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1名詞定義3.2粉末規格3.3熱化與熱物分析3.4粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1粉碎4.2混合4.3成團第五章 成形製程5.1乾壓法5.2注漿法5.3塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定6.1固液相界面6.2帶電界面6.3穩定態6.4流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統7.1水懸浮液7.2泥漿性質7.3牛頓型懸浮液7.4有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程8.1壓濾製程8.2離心製程8.3注漿製程8.4乳化及發泡製程8. 5其他
description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理、工科學生作為研習管理的入門課程(實務研討)，內容大體上包括有管理的基本理論、管理資訊系統、創新性技術對傳統的挑戰、科技法律概念、科技發展的專利地圖與迴避設計、科技知識管理、個案討論等等。在今天快速變動與競爭激烈的經營環境中，屬於無形資產之一的科學技術往往被認為是企業最不容易評估以及最不容易管理的課題，從歷史眼光看，大凡一家公司能夠將本身的技術管理的好並且能即時掌握競爭對手的最新技術動態，通常多能成就一番非凡事業。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary management study for graduate school  students majoring in science and engineering. It is focused on issues related to: Fundamental Principles of Management, Management Information System, The Challenge of Innovative Technologies to Tradition, The Concept of Technology Law, Patent Mapping and Design -Around of Research & Development, Knowledge management of Technology and Case Discussions, etc. In today's fast moving and keenly competitive management environment, the evaluation and management of the scientific technology, one of the intangible assets, have been considered the ultimately difficult issues in every business enterprise. From the viewpoint of history, provided that an enterprise not only can properly manage their own technology but also can get the latest information of their competitors' technologies, it would always accomplish notable achievements.

notes: 材料所與材料所在職專班合開

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述:(I) 高分子之非結晶性質(a) 高分子鏈之機率結構(b) 分子鏈之運動方式(c) 高分子熱力學(d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討)(e) WLF經通曲線(II)高分子之結晶性質(a) 結晶晶格之分析(b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計(c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響(d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較(e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

description.zh: 本課程介紹高分子奈米複合材料之基本原理、製備加工、結構形態與其特殊物理及化學性質，並討論其應用及發展趨勢。
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles, synthesis approaches, processing techniques, morphology, characterization, and the unique chemical and physical aspects associated with polymer based nanocomposite materials. It will also describe the applications and the development of high performance materials as well as future directions for research in the field.

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源﹐分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。內容包括環境工程有關之單元操作及設計﹐並對生物反應氣之組合、操作及用途加以介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmemtal pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

description.zh: 環境生態學主要講述基本生態學之原理原則，進而應用於土木建設工程的方式主要內容包含：(1)環境生態系統、(2)生態學之基本法則、(3)質與能傳遞、(4)汙染物對生態之影響、(5)台灣地區之生態保育、(6)工程開發生態系統造成之影響、(7)環境影響評估、(8)交通及營建工程之環境問題、(9)全球環境變遷、(10)環境品質與法規。
description.en: How to use the national sources in a way to have sustainable development is the main purpose of this study. Improper usage of resources will bring a serious disaster from the natural feed back. Construction should take care of the ecology system and the methods of carefulness would be studied in this course.

description.zh: 地質工程為一新興科學，原來為解決全球變遷等大尺度問題而提出。基本上可以土木及環境工程兩大方面。本課程將從地質背景出發，結合工程問題及其處理對策，提供學生一個整合性的思考及基礎的地質知能。
description.en: Geoengineering is planetary-scale environmental engineering, particularly engineering aimed at counteracting the undesired side effects of other human activities. Geoengineering covers a wide range of engineering disciplines related to geo-materials, such as foundation engineering, slope engineering, tunnelling, rock engineering, engineering geology and geo-environmental engineering. This course interests range from geological to geomorphological concept, to provide a firm fundamental background for the civil engineering and environmental engineering, and to manage and mitigate of natural hazards. Implicit in these pursuits is the stewardship of the earth, and the quest to harvest the most advanced fruits of scientific achievements as tools for our graduates to work with.

description.zh: 教導程式設計的重要概念、理論基礎、及實際應用，本課程將以Java語言授課並涵蓋Java類別、圖形使用者介面和物件導向式設計、目錄/樹/雜湊表/圖的資料結構、排序和搜尋、及其他運算法技巧如：各個擊破、沿樹和圖來回移動的方法、及貪婪運算等。
description.en: Fundamental programming concepts are presented together with supporting theoretical bases and practical applications. This is a list of topics that will be covered in this course: Java classes, GUI and object-oriented programming, data structures for lists, trees, hash tables, and graphs, sorting and searching, and several algorithmic methods such as divide-and-conquer, tree and graph traversal methods, and greedy algorithms.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

description.zh: 使學生了解如何將計算機程式用到工程科學上,授課內容包括:計算機之誤差產生,非線性方程式,線性方程式,本微值與本微向量,離散函數近似法(內據合成 Date-fitting,微分與積分.
description.en: 1.Non-linear algebric equations. 2.Linear algebric equations 3.Eigenvalues an eigenvectors 4.Discrete functions approximation. 5.Differentiation and inteqration.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生：(1)橋梁之功能及組織、(2)橋梁之種類、(3)橋梁之上部結構、(4)橋梁之下部結構：(a)基礎(b)橋台(c)橋墩、(5)橋梁之伸縮設施、(6)橋面排水設施、(7)欄杆及照明設施、(8)跨海大橋、陸橋、高架橋及跨河大橋等簡介。
description.en: Planning,desing,constroution and maintenance of the various bridges.

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

description.zh: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the theory and application of groundwater flow modeling, focusing on MODFLOW. The topic is including numerical methods, discreteness and boundaries, parameterization and calibration, problems and case-histories.

description.zh: 母體分配圖形之間的關係:皮爾生偏態係數,動差態係數,謝比雪夫不等式,經驗法則,線性轉換與子分數 3.機率論:事件,機率函數,條件機率,獨立事件 4.隨機變數與機率分配:離散分配,連續分配,結合分配,邊際分配,5.特殊機率分配,二項分配,卜瓦松分配,超幾何分配,常態分配,6.抽樣分配:卡方分配,t 分配 ,F分配
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Etatics quantities (a)Mean,median,mode (b)Varianl,mean absolute deriation (c)Pearson's coef of skewness,chebyshev's Inequality,Empirical rule,zscore 3.Probability:Events probability Function,Conditional probability,Independent Event 4.Random Variable and probability pistribution:Discrete Distribution,Continuons Distribution Marginal Distribution 5.Binomial pistribution,Bernoulli Distribution,Poission Distribution,Hypergeometric Distribution,Normal Distribution 6.Gama Distribution,T Distribution,F Distribution.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

name.zh: 數值分析在結構工程上之應用
name.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical Analysis

description.zh: 電腦基本知識，中英文文書處理系統的基本設計理念與現有系統實習，電腦工作底稿功能架構說明及應用實習，資料庫管理系統基本觀念，工程資訊管理系統基本觀念，資料庫設計及資料庫軟體系統使用練習，簡易型之統計繪圖軟體及工程應用實例，其他現代電腦科技發展與其在結構上之應用個案。
description.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical AnalysisThe application of computer about civil engineering, such as officials Dispatch to handle in Chinese and English, the software of drawings and using software of data base etc.

description.zh: 本課程將針對如何從土壤動力試驗評估土壤的動態力學參考數導入,作為理論解或者數值解的輸入值,以預測土壤在震動下的變形行為,以及分析土壤與結構物的動態互制行為.內容包括:波傳遞理論,土壤的動力性質,土壤的液化,基礎的振動問題,等等..
description.en: This course will teach how to evaluate the soil's dynamic material properties by means of dynamic laboratory testing.Based on the analytical and numerical solution,the behaviour of soil-structure dynamic interaction can be predicted.

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統(Geographical Information System，簡稱GIs)之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

description.zh: 地下水為地球上可資利用且蘊藏最豐富之淡水資源，本課程以介紹地下水文相關理論及實務為主，有助於學生了解地下水之開發利用與經營管理。課程內容包括地下水之來源、流動及開發應用，以及各項天然或人為化學汙染對地下水系統質與量之影響評估 。
description.en: This course is concerned with the theory and practice of hydrology, the science of water in subsurface environments which are helpful for groundwater resource exploitation and management. It is divided into two main parts: (1) basic concepts dealing with the origin, movement of groundwater, and its recovery from wells, and (2) a qualitative and quantitative assessment of the chemistry of natural and contaminated systems.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 延續基礎水文學，使學生更深入了解水文工程上之問題及如何以不同之方法解決。本課程將包含線性與非線性系統之理論與應用、水文模式之發展及係數之率定等方法。
description.en: Presentation and evaluation of a variety of mathematical modeling techniques; presentation of theoretical basis of linear/nonlinear systems, advantages and limitations of various approaches, e.g., linear vs. nonlinear, lumped vs. distributed, used in hydrologic modeling; interrelation between function development and model calibration requirements.

description.zh: 水文遙測主要之目的為藉由衛星及飛機等的儀器收集地表對不同波長之反射特性，並加以分析，因此可用於國土監測及防災等。藉由波長反射的特性可率訂所需的參數，將可用於大尺度的模擬，如地表能量平衡、地表水文、土地利用、植物指標、地表溫度、輻射通量及地表土壤濕度等。
description.en: Observations by instruments on board satellites provide data on radiative characteristics of the earth's surface at various wavelengths.  From these characteristics, one may determine parameters of interest for large-scale modeling of the earth's energy balance and surface hydrology, for instance land use, vegetation indices, surface temperature, radiative fluxes, and surface soil moisture.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個BIM相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM程式撰寫，BIM系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

notes: 博班(綜科館第三演講廳)

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

description.zh: 1.導論2.無失真壓縮技術3.量化與轉換編碼4.動作估計與動作補償5.MPEG視訊編碼標準6.視訊編碼在傳輸時的考量7.無線傳播通道8.無線通訊系統之數位調變技術9.無線通訊系統之通道編碼技術10.多重路徑衰落通道之應對技術11.無線多媒體通訊系統與標準
description.en: 1.Introductions 2.Entropy coding 3.Rate-distortion theory and quantization 4.Motion compensation and Interframe coding5.MPEG video coding 6.Multimedia transmission 7.Wireless propagation channels 8.Digital modulation in wireless systems 9.Channel coding in wireless systems 10.Schemes to overcome multipath fading 11.Standards of wireless multimedia communication systems

notes: 電子所碩博與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在研討傳統的結構化語言的編譯技術。課程所所涵蓋的內容包括有： - 語句上的分析、語句分析器的製作 - 由上而下的組譯器製作 - 由下而上的組譯器製作 - 語意分析 - 機器碼之產生與暫存器之配置 - 資料流分析的理論與應用 - 程式碼最佳化處理。課程的實施，將以基本編譯技術為主，作深入的介紹。學習所得的觀念與技術，將利用一個實驗性語言編譯器的實作來貫穿。因此，程式規畫實作，將在這個課程中，佔有相當大的比重。
description.en: This course discusses issues in the compilation of conventional block-structured languages, as listed below. - lexical analysis, scanner generators; - top-down parsing, LL(1) parsers; - bottom-up parsing SLR, LALR, LR(1) parsers, parser generators; - semantic analysis; - code generation and register allocation, code generator generators; - dataflow analysis: theory and practice; - code optimization. There will be a significant programming component to the course

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解 1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

description.zh: 本課程介紹固體，尤其是半導體的光學性質，目的在了解光學檢測及光電元件的基礎原理。 藉由學習電磁波與半導體的交互作用，一方面可了解光在半導體中的產生、傳播、吸收、散射、及在界面的透射與反射等現象的規律，另一方面亦可認識光學特性與能帶結構、聲子結構、束縛與自由電子、及各種激發態之間的關係。課程內容包含固態物理複習、光學特性簡介、古典模型、帶間躍遷、激子、螢光現象、半導體低維系統的光學性質、自由載子及缺陷的光學性質、聲子相關特性、非線性光學性質等。

description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.

description.zh: 智慧建築系統整合平台能達到提高建築物整體管理的效率與綜合服務的能力，降低營運成本及突發災害的損失。本課程將培養具備建築應用子系統相關設備選用、安裝、介面與通訊之整合能力，以及系統整合的策略與方法。授課之內容如下：系統整合之各項介面原理與架構型態、通訊平台種類與運行方式、系統連動策略與方式、操作平台使用及管理、工程執行注意要項與流程。

description.zh: 現代主義運動，帶動了新建築的發展，也致使廿世紀的建築有了全新的可能。工業革命之後所帶動的，不僅僅是生產與製造的工業化，也不僅僅是資本的集中以及資本量的大幅成長。整個十九世紀的發展都是為了邁向一個全新的紀元，營建材料的開發、營建技術的發展、空間概念的突破，開創新的建築面貌以及新的建築歷史。這個將近兩百年的建築發展，影響了廿世紀的建築教育，並且提供養分，供給新的世代的建築新發展。本課程將就十九、廿世紀的建築發展的歷史脈絡進行梳理，學生將由本課程理解今日其所進行的建築設計之來源。
description.en: The Modern Movement of Architecture leads the development of new architecture, it thus deduce a whole new possibility of architecture. The Industrial Revolution is the motor of the whole movement. The building construction is industrialized under this overall influence to the society, not only on the concentration of capitals. The social life has been changed. Nineteenth Century is a struggling period with European tradition, moving forward to a new imagination, on the development of construction material, technics, also on the breakthrough on the spatial concept.This evolution on architecture influences architectural education of 20th Century, and feeds the new creation of architecture. This course is to understand this historic evolution and context, to understand the source and establish knowledge in face of their future architectural activities.

notes: 四創意三與四建二合開(建築)

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

name.en: Applications and Services of Cloud Computing

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，因而顧客可隨時取用Web化的網路資源、軟體或資料。實際上，雲端運算 (Cloud Computing)是新一代的網際網路服務以及新一代的資料中心。本課程的主要內容包含網路基礎(含TCP/IP)、Client/Server和Intranet計算、雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算的核心技術、多人租用控制、雲端運算的服務模式、雲端運算應用架構、雲端運算的安全/私密/信任管理議題、雲端運算的發展策略以及結論。此外，本課程亦選擇一些有關雲端運算的期刊論文指定予同學研讀並於課堂上簡報和討論之。總之，本課程的教學目標是為了能讓同學完全瞭解最新的雲端運算之技術趨勢、應用發展以及服務管理。
description.en: Cloud Computing is a new model for enabling convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources that can be rapidly provisioned and released with minimal management effort or service provider interaction. Practically, Cloud Computing is new frontier of Internet Computing and next generation Data Centers. This course covers Networking Fundamentals (including TCP/IP); Client/Server and Intranet Computing; Cloud Computing: An Overview; Core Technologies of Cloud Computing; Cloud Service Models; Multi-tenancy Control, Cloud Application Architecture: Hadoop: HDFS, Hbase, MapReduce; Security, Privacy and Trust Management Issues for Cloud Computing; Developing Strategies in Cloud Computing; and Conclusion. In summary, the teaching goal of this course is to provide students with the full understanding in technologies trend, applications development, and services management of Cloud Computing.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述財務管理中最重要的投資決策、融資決策與短期資金管理決策之基本架構及企業經理人之財務決策，配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹財務管理之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務管理的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的融資與投資決策制定。課程內容涵蓋：金融市場與金融機構、財務報表與現金流量分析、財務規劃與預測、風險與報酬、債券與股票之評價、資金成本、資本預算決策、資本結構與財務槓桿、營運資金管理、股利政策…等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，以及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 本課程目的為使學生認識資源處理之各種物理選別及濕式冶金技術，包括破碎、粉碎、篩分、比重選別、浮游選別、磁力選別等物理選別技術，以及吸附、離子交換、溶媒萃取、晶析、沉澱分離等濕式冶金技術，並熟悉其理論基礎與使用時機，進而活用各種技術於實際之資源回收再生工作上。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and application of various resources processing technologies, including the physical separation technologies such as crushing, grinding, sieving, gravitation separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc., as well as the hydrometallurgy technologies such as adsorption, ion exchange, solvent extraction, crystallization, precipitation, etc.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with the procedures of research in education and applied linguistics. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; case study; grounded theory research; ethnographic research; narrative research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

description.zh: 本課程重點包括MLA論文格式以及論文引用形式。本課程內容同時也協助學生準備碩士論文寫作，亦將使修課同學學習什麼是一個好的論文題目、如何開始探究議題、以及用清楚及正確的英文改進論文初稿。
description.en: This course covers basic MLA style and citation formats for research papers, and also helps students to prepare for writing their M.A. thesis by focusing on issues such as what makes for a good research question, how to begin researching a topic, and how to improve draft papers by using clear and correct English.

description.zh: 本課程目標在提供學生英漢與漢英口譯專業訓練。課程內容含括專業逐步與同步口譯技巧，以及口譯過程與訓練的學術理論。重點將置於重述、記憶訓練、數字與語法轉換、筆記與跟述練習，以累積逐步與同步口譯技巧。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with professional training in aspects of Chinese<->English interpreting. Course contents will cover both techniques in professional consecutive and simultaneous interpreting and academic research in the interpreting process and training. Emphasis will be placed on paraphrase, recall, numeric and syntactic conversion, note-taking and shadowing, which will lead to build-up skills in consecutive and simultaneous interpreting.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.en: The course covers the analysis,design and simplification of bath combinational and sequential systems.Contents include:1.Number systems and codes2.Booolean algebra3.Simplification of Boolean algebra4.Combinational logic5.Programmable logic array6.Flip-flops7.Synchronous and asynchronous sequential circuits8.Recursive networks9.VHDL

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics
