description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程乃專門為培育未來之企業領導人之精英人才而設計整學期之課程規劃。有鑑於加速之國際化與全球化之政經趨勢, 各專業領域之企業領導者面臨益加複雜之企業決策，牽涉到各種層面而常面臨"兩難" 甚至"三難"或"多難"之局面，如何能在面對這些多元多面暨看似衝突之企業目標與經濟決策，乃是當今高階管理之重要課題之一！有鑑於此,涵培育具有遠見與智慧見識之未來領袖，本課程為培育IMBA課程之年青學子多項關鍵之能力，除啟發各個學生之領導特質與才華，亦將建立其面對多元企業決策時之判斷力、價值觀、 對企業與社會之認知與準則，透過各種專業管理個案之研討與實戰模擬，學生們也將學習有關策略思考之分析架構，組織管理與再造，企業倫理各方面相關之管理議題與能力之建構。
description.en: In the era of technological & social growth at an exponential speed, more than ever, business leaders across the globe are facing even more challenging issues, not just economic aspects but also legal and ethical aspects.  In this elite IMBA program of NTUT, this course is specifically designed for developing future leaders for corporations & organizations in various business domains.  How to simultaneously achieve the corporate objectives and fulfill the ethical responsibilities without compromising fundamental principles and standards of conduct when facing dilemma is imperative for us to learn and ponder upon. With this vision and mission in mind, the lecturer is committed to inspire the students’ talent within as in all the other executive management programs.  This IMBA course will equip all participating international students with multiple pillars of those grounds in being a great leader in the future, including building fundamental mindset and value system for managing chal

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

description.zh: 本課程將介紹模糊邏輯、模糊推論、模糊控制及其應用。滑動模式控制、適應性控制、最佳控制、基因演算法及其相關智慧型控制方法之設計及應用也將在此課程中被探討。此外，藉由一些物理及工程的系統以驗證課程中所介紹之智慧型控制法方之可行性及有效性。
description.en: In this course, fuzzy logic, fuzzy inference, fuzzy control and its application will be introduced. In addition, sliding mode control, adaptive control, genetic algorithm and optimal control will also be explored in this course. Moreover, some engineering and physical models are used to show the feasibility and validity of these intelligent control methods.

description.zh: 本課程以講授工業用計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到目前廣泛於工業上使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。媒體存取控制也包含目前廣泛於各類控制器上使用的控制區域網路 (CAN Bus)。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器使用的路由協定與路由演算法。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer. Popular physical layer medium are discussed first. Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion. The contents of the media access control also include CAN bus which is widely used in various controllers. Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

description.zh: 無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
description.en: Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

description.zh: 基礎知識與定義、大氣汙染、空氣汙染物、水文循環、水質處理、水汙染、固體廢棄物、大地汙染、噪音汙染、工業廢氣處理。
description.en: Basics and definitions, atmospheric and land pollutions, air pollurants, hydrology, water pollution and treatment, solid waste, noise pollution, industrial exhaust air treatment.

description.zh: 車輛底盤與結構實驗內容包括: (1)車輛底盤分析與實驗；(2)車輛噪音分析與實驗；(3)車輛結構分析與實驗。學生將學習車輛設計的基本要求，並練習如何應用適當工具求得車底盤與結構系統主要性能，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: This course aims to train students in understanding the fundamental vehicle design requirements and utilizing tools to obtain the major characteristics and performance of the vehicle. Topics include: (1) Vehicle Chassis System Measurements, (2) Vehicle Sound Quality Measurements, (3) Vehicle Structure Analyses and Measurements.

description.zh: 介紹汽機車上各控制系統之硬體及控制策略，包含引擎系統之空燃比、怠速、冷起動、爆震、廢氣，傳動系統之變速、傳動，煞車系統之ABS、TCS、SRS，懸吊系統之半主動及主動式懸吊，智慧型道路系統之頭燈、環境、巡航、跟隨、夜視等控制系統。
description.en: This course introduces hardware and control strategies used in each control systems in a vehicle.  These control systems include engine system (AF ratio, idle speed, cold start, knocking, exhaust), transmission system, brake system (ABS, TCS, SRS), suspension system (semi-active and active), intelligent transportation system (headlight, environment, cruise, following, night vision) etc..

description.zh: 1. 替代燃料的介紹。2. 替代燃料的分類。3. 車輛用植物性燃料、混合燃料和金屬/液態/氣態燃料電池的種類、應用以及未來發展。
description.en: 1. Introduction of alternative fuels. 2. Classification of alternative fuels. 3. Kind, application, and future of Vegetable Fuels, Blended Fuels, Metel/Liquit/Gas Fuel Cells for Vehicles.

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 車輛產業是一個不允許失效發生的產業，為了防止系統失效的發生，必須有一套嚴謹且可靠的開發流程來讓開發工程師依循。如何提供一套功能安全設計流程來讓開發工程師依循，且對於分析結果有嚴謹的確認制度是相關產業未來生存與發展之非常重要的工作，因此車輛安全技術國際標準(ISO 26262) 將成為車輛產業系統功能安全設計分析手法的主流。
description.en: The occurrence of system failure is not allowed in vehicle industry. In order to prevent it, developers must have rigorous and reliable development processes. How to provide a set of functional safety design processes to help developers to follow and a strict accreditation criterion to ensure that analysis results are consistent with requirements are very important for the related industries to survive and develop.  Consequently, ISO 26262, the international standard of road vehicles functional safety will become the main analysis techniques of a system function safety design for vehicle industry in future.

description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 瞭解組合邏輯與序向邏輯電路之分析，設計及簡化之方法，內容包含：１.數系：數位系統所使用之各種數系及其轉換之方法２.布氏代數：了解布氏代數的基本運算法和定律，及認識基本邏輯   及邏輯閘３.布氏代數之簡化：介紹各種布氏代數之簡化方法４.組合邏輯：據布氏代數及邏輯閘，計分析各種組合邏輯電路５.可程式邏輯陣列：介紹ＰＬＡ，ＰＡＬ，ＦＰＧＡ等之設計方法６.正反器：介紹各種正反器電路及了解其基特性７.同步與非同步序向電路：介紹各種同步與非同步序向電路分析與   設計之方法 ８.遞迴網路：介紹遞迴網路之設計方法９.ＶＨＤＬ：介紹如何使用ＶＨＤＬ語言設計數位電路

name.en: English practice and training for engineers

description.zh: 本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。      二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。      三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。      四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。      五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 本課程介紹連續時間與離散時間訊號與系統的基本概念。訊號與系統的分析廣泛地應用在模擬、分析、與設計實際物理過程。本課程可做為線性系統、通訊系統與數位訊號處理等較進階課程之基礎課程。授課內容大綱如下：1.訊號與系統簡介2.線性非時變系統3.週期訊號之傅立葉級數表示法4.連續時間訊號與系統的傅立葉分析5.離散時間訊號與系統的傅立葉分析6.取樣7.調變8.濾波9.拉普拉斯變換10.Z變換
description.en: This course covers fundamental concepts in signals and systems, which are broadly used for modeling, analyzing, and designing physical processes. Both the continuous-time and the discrete-time aspects will be considered. This course can be viewed as the prerequisite for the advanced courses such as linear systems, communication systems and digital signal processing.  The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.Introduction to Signals and Systems2.	Linear Time-invariant Systems3.Fourier Series Representation for Periodical Signals4.Fourier Analysis for Continuous-time Signals and Systems5.Fourier Analysis for Discrete-time Signals and Systems6.Sampling7.	Modulation8.Filtering9.	Laplace Transform10.Z Transform

Therefore, the student has the design capability of baseband communication integrated circuits. The contents of this course: 1. Digital transmission 2.Channel model 3.Receiver design 4.Advanced systems design

description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(三)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(III)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 產品服務系統設計專案研究

description.zh: 產品服務系統設計專案研究包含研究與設計。本課程強調具知識內涵的設計過程，以知識的探討與研究為手段，豐富設計創意的發展。透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。本課程藉由設計主題或產學合作進行實際演練，應用新科技與新材料的發展，並探討生活型態與市場的需求，研發創新型態的產品服務系統。其中應用的方法包括：問題分析，需求研究，方案評估，設計檢核，價值呈現及績效評價。
description.en: Product Service System Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems – innovatively. ‘Innovation’ is the ultimate stage for learning, critical thinking and combining all acquired knowledge to produce something new and unique. This course provides an approach to Knowledge Embedded Design. In order to identify, expand and test user’s requirement, research and design process will be carried out under the instruction, which includes Identify the Problem, Investigation Research, Identify Possible Solution, Choose Best Solution & Develop Detail, Implement Solution, and finally, Test & Evaluation.

name.zh: 智慧建築系統整合平台

description.zh: 智慧建築系統整合平台能達到提高建築物整體管理的效率與綜合服務的能力，降低營運成本及突發災害的損失。 本課程將培養具備建築應用子系統相關設備選用、安裝、介面與通訊之整合能力，以及系統整合的策略與方法。 授課之內容如下：系統整合之各項介面原理與架構型態、通訊平台種類與運行方式、系統連動策略與方式、操作平台使用及管理、工程執行注意要項與流程。
description.en: Intelligent building systems integration platform can improve building energy efficiency and overall management of integrated services capabilities, reduce operating costs and losses of sudden disasters. This course will train with building application subsystems related equipment selection, installation, integration of interface and communication, and strategy and methods of system integration. Teaching content as follows: System integration of the interface principles and architecture patterns, types of communication platforms and operating mode, the system linked strategies and methods, operating platform and management, project execution careful to terms with the process.

notes: 四電三四甲乙丙、電子四甲乙與最後一哩合開，限28人

name.zh: 社會新鮮人的職場生涯規劃

description.zh: 本課程介紹SWOT分析、個人夢想、價值觀、潛能開發等工具及手法。幫助我們將個人夢想、價值觀、人生目標與行動策略協調一致，去除不必要摸索，整合個人最大的優勢與資源，取得職場生涯規劃之成功的機會。本課程以案例討論為主題，實際帶領學員運用工具及手法，學習掌握的個人人生目標，進一步的更有效的幫助年輕人快樂的就業、達成幸福的發展生涯。
description.en: This course introduces the SWOT analysis, personal dreams, values, potential development tools and methods. It helps us for coordinating the action plans of personal dreams, values, goals and strategy to remove unnecessary finding. This class also integrates the best personal strengths and resources to obtain a opportunity for a successful career plan. This course is focused on the case discussions and lead students to learn to how to achieve personal life goals of more effective and happier career development.

notes: 四工三甲乙與最後一哩合開，限大三大四同學修習，50人

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

notes: 電機系碩士班、電資外生專班、自動化所合開

description.zh: 講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 為增進本校工程相關科系學生之基礎數學能力，本課程希望在18小時中，能使學生對基礎數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習微積分之數學基礎。課程內容包括：1. 數與式、2. 不等式、3. 直角坐標系、4. 直線、5. 圓錐曲線、6. 指數與對數、7. 三角函數、8. 向量。
description.en: With the purpose for improving the comprehension in fundamental mathematics for students who major in Engineering, and for building up solid background of Calculus for students' future training, it is planned to have this course. This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. Vectors.

notes: A班,每週一、四18:30~21:10(開學第二週開始上課)

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 大三上特教生(限領有聽障手冊生),資源教室

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

notes: 大一上特教生(限領有聽障手冊生);資源教室

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

notes: 大二上特教生(限領有聽障或多重障手冊生)

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

notes: 文學向度，限外籍生修讀

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器人技術，程式，與應用各類基礎。其中包括機器人動作分析與控制、機器人程式語言、機器人運動學、夾爪與末端效應器之運用。 根據各階段實際操作 RV-M2 、CSIRB-2000 、以及 X-YETITE 各型機器人。 實驗包括機器人重現性、動作與路徑、順應性、棧板堆疊等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of Industrial Robot.  The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics:1. fundamentals of robot technology, programming; and applications,2. robot motion ,analysis and control3.  robot end effectors4. robot cell design and control 5. assembly and inspectionsafety, training ,maintenance, and quality

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills. Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

notes: 四車四、車輛所與車輛所在職專班合開

name.zh: 個人化智慧型捷運車輛與運作系統
name.en: Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System

description.zh: 本課程將未來個人化智慧型捷運車輛科技發展如何面對都市化人口集中、高車輛密度所造成之環境衝擊，能源短缺之節能需求，個人差異化之個人便捷智慧化車輛之需求，及與未來都會新交通網結合之最後一哩路之未來車發展之動向。課程中將以系統、組件、基礎學理介紹未來車之整車發展趨勢、動力種類及性能的追求方向、輕量化結構之材料創新、新能源之應用與系統管理科技之發展。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle" and the "Operation System". And it will drive to focus on the future vehicle technology development to face the challenges on the environmental impacts from the growth of the crowed mega cities, on the energy saving due to the shortage of the foil fuel, on the differentiation and ICT innovation from the young people, and on the metropolitan last-mile transportation solution to link with the public transportation system. This course contains numerous fundamental domain knowledge and technologies including vehicle system, powertrain module, energy module, lightweight chassis, environmental policy, infrastructure planning and innovative business model investigation, etc. Students will learn the fundamental knowledge of the future "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System" development.

notes: 四車四、車輛所與車輛所在職專班合開

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間)運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意空調的基本原理，冷凍的基本循環原理：冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Piping and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 本課程以講授高等精密量測之原理與技術為主，課程包括下列主題：精密量測概論，幾何誤差分析，系統誤差分析，機器體積誤差計算及自動化補償技術，表面粗糙度之精密量測與分析，智慧型量測系統設計，奈米量測，微光機電量測及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced principles and techniques used in Precision Metrology (PM). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction, geometric errors analysis, system errors analysis, machine volumetric errors and automatic compensation, surface roughness measurement and analysis, design of intelligent measurement systems, and conclusion.

name.en: Practice on Fabric Coating and Finishing

description.zh: 了解及熟悉各種布膜塗佈之技術, 每周實習以製作各種功能性布料為主. 布膜塗佈之技術包含(1)刮刀塗佈，(2)輪式塗佈，及(3)熔融輪壓塗佈(順塗，逆塗)等。功能性布料種類則包含吸汗，透氣，撥水，保溫，抗起球等各種性質。
description.en: To introduce various coating techniques which include (1) knife coating (2) gravure coating (3) hot melt coating (co-rotating and counter rotation). The functions built in the fabric includes (1) water absorption (2) water repellence (3) cooling (4) warm protection (5) anti peeling… etc..

name.zh: 創意城市與城市規劃專論
name.en: Special Topics on Creative City and City Planning

description.zh: 目前全世界超過一半以上的人口生活在城市，人數仍快速增加中，相伴而來的環境、經濟、社會與治理問題將如何處理？因此城市轉型是城市要繼續成長的必要過程，許多案例顯示創意城市是城市轉型的典範，可以作為城市轉型與再生的契機。創意城市是近年來先進國家鼓勵領導者、產業、市民從己身城市內思考、規劃、發揮創意與實現城市創新的觀念，以啟發城市找到自身的發展潛能，結合當地文化資產及地方特色，經由城市發展規劃提升創意經濟及城市的競爭力。本課程以文化創意、產業創新及城市規劃為主軸，包括研究創意城市定義、特徵、條件、構成、指標、類型、評估的基礎，進而探討與文化創意、產業創新、城市發展規劃的關連，並參考國內外城市的創新與再生案例，他們是如何在城市議題上思考、規劃與執行富有創意的行動，又如何將行動運用於城市規劃。課程經由互動分析創意城市與城市規劃的關連及作法，討論可供借鏡的發展策略與方案。
description.en: The creative city is crucial to urban transformation in the future of our city. It means to encourage leaders,industries, and citizens to think, plan, create and realize urban innovation, inspired by the city to find their own development potential, combined with local cultural assets and characteristics, to enhance the creative economy through urban development planning and the city's competitiveness. The course aims at framing cultural creativity, industrial innovation and urban planning as main thoughts on the basis of research. Literature review including definition, characteristics, conditions, indicators, types of assessment, and then to explore with the cases of innovation and regeneration around the world. How they think urban issues, planning and implementation on creative actions, and how the actions used in urban planning.Courses via interactive analysis among the creative city,urban planning and practices,to figure out development strategies and programs available to learn.

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調管理專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service management students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

name.zh: 動畫電影中的中世紀文化
name.en: Knights, Monsters, Castles and Other Things Medieval in Hollywood Movies and Japanese Anime

description.zh: 廣義上，中世紀時期可被定義為由羅馬帝國的衰落開始並持續至十五世紀文藝復興。中古世紀被文藝復興時期的人們視為一段缺乏啟蒙、知識及現代化的黑暗時期。然而許多黑暗時期的故事--如亞瑟王與圓桌武士、聖杯、龍和公主—卻一直以現代書籍及電影的方式流傳至今。本課程將探討弔詭的現代中世紀現象，亦即現代西方如何以多樣的手段去詮釋、改寫或紀念中古世紀，使得這種千年前的文化在現代重生。本課程同時也將討論日本動畫家及漫畫家是如何以動漫的方式將西方中世紀故事及元素巧妙的融合進現代日本流行文化。
description.en: The Medieval Period can be defined broadly as that period from the fall of the Roman Empire to the 15th century Italian Renaissance – a dark time, if one is to believe the men of the Renaissance, in need of light, knowledge, modernization. Yet the stories of these dark ages – of Arthur and his knights, the Holy Grail, dragons and princesses – continue to be retold and enjoyed in modern books and films. This course will examine the paradoxical phenomenon of modern medievalism, looking at the varied ways the modern West has borrowed, celebrated, and rewritten its medieval past, a culture strangely as alive now as it was a thousand years ago. We will consider, too, how western medieval stories and images are also being cleverly adapted and transformed in modern Japanese pop culture by anime and manga artists.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1.簡介2.信號與系統3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變7.數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 本課程探討蓄熱蓄冷的技術實作，藉由業界師資的授課與實務操作，鼓勵學生開發具實用價值的創意技術，進而能應用於業界。內容包含:課程大綱講述、儲冰系統原理與儲冰槽工程應用、凍結式系統規劃設計、絕熱性能量測、相變化物質原理與應用等。
description.en: This course investigates the practical implementation of heat-cold accumulating technology. Through lectures and designed targets provided by the masters from industries, the students may develop the innovative and practical technologies for benefiting the industry. The content includes outline description, theory and implementation of cold accumulation system, applying implementation of cold accumulation tank, design and implementation of frozen system, measurement of heat-insolation property, theory and application of phase change material, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹各種光學方法，用以量測位移及角度之變化，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號，以便進行分析。其內容含 :            ．簡介                ．雙頻干涉儀        ．幾何誤差            ．光學尺        ．幾何光學法          ．雷射光學尺        ．干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target . Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves :               ．Introduction            ．Optical Heterodyne Interfeometer        ．Geometrical Error       ．Optical Encoder         ．Geometrical  Methods   ．Laser Encoder        ．Interferometers

notes: 光電所與製科所合開，億光835

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh: 室內設計在3D場景的應用，包括模型的建立，燈光材質的設定以及整體設計之搭配。
description.en: The Application of interior design in 3D scene, including the setting-up of model, establishment of the light material and matching of integrated design.

description.zh: 1.數位科技時代在摩爾定律的預估下，地球上人類生活經濟的變化，已非從工業經濟時代的經營觀念與法則所能因應。2.創新設計已成為了企業因變應變的主要法則，美國設計管理協會副主席GE公司業務副總裁Beth Comstock於2011國際美國設計管理協會年會 (DMI)中曾提出，「在21世紀企業經營重點在創新設計，創新設計的重點是如何有效應用於企業經營」。美國商業週刊2005/7月封面故事標題是「明日的商學院可能被設計學院取代」美國哈佛大學管理論壇專文曾提出未來企業經營主管將不只要在經管團隊中聘請設計師，而本身應該成為一個設計師。3.本課程是今日數位科技時代，企業應用創新設計思維進行創新的核心課程，並以3M前新產品開發主管Gerard H. Gaynor 「Innovation by Design」及Roger Martin的「The Design of Business」為參考課本輔以美國設計管理協會出版(DMI)的國際創新設計成功範例教學。本課程將以理論，實例與實務工作營方式進行。
description.en: As the forecasting of Moor's law, In today's rapid progressing technology and economic Era, The traditional rule of business management and product development, will no longer be effective."What business needs now is design, What design needs now, is making it about business"  Beth Comstock. SVP. GE. and Co-Chair. DMI. Conference 2011.The Vice Chair of American Design Management Institute. The cover story of Business Week,2005 5/31 " B school today, tomorrow will be D school", The Business Review of Harvard University  "The CEO today should be a designer, not just to hire them" Innovation and the utilization of design thinking, will play the main role, In the future business development,This curriculum is the core course of innovative design thinking, for business manager and product and service innovator.The main reference material of the course are "Innovation by Design" Gerard H, Gaynor, 3M former Head of Product Development, and "The Design of Business" by Roger Martin, and the

notes: 四設三、四設四、創新所與創新所在職專班合開

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of bioprocess engineering, which is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze bioprocesses. The course will first survey the basics ideas from microbiology and biochemistry. Subsequently, the emphasis will be the application of engineering concepts to biological problems. The following topics will be included: enzyme kinetics, major metabolic pathways, cell growth, stoichiometry, bioreactor operation, and product recovery and purification.

description.zh: 本課程介紹資料分析與圖示的工具與方法，包括如何以精確的模式來描述資料、利用各種指標與圖形來探索給定資料的特性、特徵、或是規律性，並且可以根據所建立的資料模型來進行估計與預測。此外，我們也將探討如何產生各種機率分布的隨機樣本，以及各種最佳化問題求解。本課程將以R程式語言為工具。
description.en: This course introduces tools and methods for data analysis and graphics. The main topics include models that are used to describe data, indices and plots for exploring data characteristics and patterns, and estimation and prediction based on the data models. In addition, we discuss how to generate random sample from probability distributions and how to solve optimization problems. The selected tool for this course is R.

description.zh: 本課程以各種生動活潑的教學法，介紹學習科學概念、科學知識與科學基礎科目的學習理論與方法，並配合實際的案例及活動設計讓學生親身體會並實踐學習理論。
description.en: A large number of active teaching method is applied to this course by introducing the leaning theory and method for a general idea of leaning science, the knowledge of science and the core subject of science, moreover, to harmony with the actual cases and the creative activities in order to make the students realize and practice the learning theory in person.

description.zh: 本課程介紹腦機介面工程之原理及應用，包括腦科學基本知識、腦機介面系統基本架構、腦波訊號處理、以及在健康照護自動化及控制領域相關應用。本課程將安排各項實習，讓學生實際操作腦波儀進行實驗與基本腦波分析。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with basic knowledge of brain science, architecture of brain-computer interface, EEG signal processing, and applications in healthcare automation and control.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用以發展與分析三維空間多體運動學與動力學的觀念, 定義, 與技巧. 主要課題包括計算動力學簡介, 剛體運動學, 動態方程的構成, 侷限動力學與空間動力學等.
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, definitions, and techniques used for developing and analyzing kinematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics. ematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics.

notes: 綜科327 限24人 限機電學院

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意微機電系統特性，微物理基本認識．微結構分析，微機械技術實例探討，微感測器及致動器分析，微壓力感測器；微液壓及微氣壓作動器製造技術．
description.en: The characteristics of micro electro-mechanical system. Basic concepts of micro physics. Analysis of a microstructure. A study of micro-machine technologies. Analysis of manufacturing technologies of micro pressure sensor, micro hydraulic and pneumatic Actuator.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

notes: 博士班，製科博與機電博合開

description.zh: 先修課程：精實製造工程。介紹最新精實製造系統和實務工具，主題包括： 1.精實製造系統概論 2.價值溪流分析 3.快速更換 4.使用點 5.源流品質 6.團隊 7.全員生產維護 8.後拉式/及時/看板生產系統 9.單元小組製造
description.en: Introduction to modern issues in lean manufacturing systems and practice of lean tools. Topics include overview of lean manufacturing systems, value stream analysis, quick changeover (QCO), point of use storage (POU), quality at the source, teams, total productive maintenance, pull/just-in-time/Kanban, and cellular manufacturing.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、迴歸分析、時間序列分析、類別資料分析、樞紐分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: This course is mainly to learn some advanced methods of statistics and their application in business. The topics include general data analysis, regression, time series analysis, category data analysis, pivot analysis and sampling investment. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in applied statistics practice.

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm, such as Backpropagation, probability ANN, Counter-propagation, self-organization map. Hopfield network, BAN etc. Besides, the relative literature and applications will also cover.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decison making and analysis.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problims.The main topics of this course include decision making without probability,decision making with probability,decison analysis with additional information,utility theory,gametheory.The related studies includes prlbability distribution,expected value approach,Bayesian analysis,expected value of perfect informatin and sample information.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制，電氣控制，數值控制，幾何數據處理，驅動系統，適應控制系統，監視系統與診斷系統，機器人控制，電腦整合精密機械系統．
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

notes: 機電所與製科所合開 製科所10選3，機電甲組8選2,限20

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。量測原理及訊號處理的一般方法（含放大電路、動態響應及頻譜分析），說明各種感測器之原理、規格、結構圖、應用的場合及其訊號處理（含速度、位移、加速度、力量、扭矩、功率、壓力、流量、溫度、化學組成、濕度、濃度、照度、電流、電壓、磁通量、磁場強度、各型感測開關等），感測器與電腦之連線。
description.en: Measurement Principles, General Methods for Signal Processing (Amplified Circuits, Dynamic Response, and Frequency spectrum Analysis), Discussion of Principle, Specification, Structure, Occasion and Location of Application of a Variety of Sensors for Measuring Physical Quantities,such as Displacement, Velocity, Acceleration, Force, Torque, Power,Pressure, Flow Rate, Temperature, Chemical Composition, Humidity,Density, Luminosity, Current, Voltage, Magnetic Flux, Magnetic Intensity , a Variety of Sensing Switch, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。視覺檢測的基本原理、視覺系統原理各元件之作用原理、規格、限制等、影像處理技術（包括影像轉換、影像復原、影像強化、影像分割）、非接觸性尺寸量測、模式辨認（自動邊境偵測：表面積、孔數、週長及重心、方向特徵等）、影像壓縮與傳送、電腦的影像傳送、個案研究。
description.en: Basic Principle of Vision Inspection, Hardware Components of Vision System, Image Processing (Image Transform, Image Restoration, Image Enhancement, Image Segmentation), Non-Contact Dimension Measurement, Pattern Recognition (Automatic Edge Detection: Surface Area, Number of Holes, Perimeter, Centroid, Directional characteristic etc.) Image Compression and Transmission, and Case Study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001054或負責教授同意。介紹數值控制架構、作用及程式寫作、加工路徑處、進給系統、位置量測系統、適應控制系統、DNC-系統、彈性製造系統、生產資料搜集系統、自動化製造之機器自我診斷。
description.en: Basic Components of an Numerical Control (NC) System, Applications of NC Machine, NC Motion Control System, Control Loop Unit, Data Processing Unit, NC Machine Programming, Coordinate Measuring Equipment, Direct Numerical Control System (DNC), Adaptive Control Machining System & Flexible Manufacturing System.

notes: 四機三甲乙丙合開，限機電學院，24人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。專利權認識與管理，著作權認識與保護，商標權認識與管理，營業秘密與競業禁止，電子商務認識與運用。
description.en: Introduction and management of Patent, Introduction and protection of Copyright, Introduction and management of Trademark, Trade Secret and Competitive business forbidden, Introduction and application of e-commerce.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 介紹基本精實理念和工具，主題包括： 1、精實原理 2、現場改善 3、徒勞辦識 4、流程製圖 5、產能分析 6、生產力分析 7、價值溪流圖 8、工作區組織與標準化 9、視覺控制/管理 10、廠房佈置及生產線平衡
description.en: Introduction to various lean concepts and lean tools at the basic level. Topics include lean principles, kaizen, none-value-adding identification, flow charting, capacity analysis, productivity analysis, value stream mapping, workplace organization and standardization, visual control/management, plant layout and line balancing.

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh: (1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD.  From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、世界英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與世界英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of World Englishes, and the development of the popularization of English as a world lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding World Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

name.zh: 創新思維執行力實務應用
name.en: Practices and applications of TRIZ innovative thinking

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新"以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM或OEM製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下:完整詳實闡述TRIZ理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明TRIZ概念、工程TRIZ實務案例10餘個與TRIZ工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約800餘個，管理實務案例20餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。本課程TRIZ研發、工程與管理兼顧，製造業與服務業高層、中層與基層員工皆符合讀者條件，使"突破創新"輕易實務執行並成為企業文化，亦適用於大學與研究所之工管、企管(經營管理)、工商管與工程相關科系，可自行按需求選擇性深入教授講解某些章節，也替產業界事先磨練一群創新思維之活力新血，可長久伴隨您在職場(或未來進入職場)解決研發、工程與管理之困難矛盾問題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in Product R&D, engineering, and management tactic in a innovative thinking manner. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

notes: 四工四甲乙、工管所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源、致動器、控制元件及迴路、傳送、配管、維護與安全、液氣壓比例與伺服控制、自動控制理論應用於液氣壓工程。
description.en: Introduction to Pneumatic Engineering, Characteristic of Compressible Gas, Air Conditioning & Control, Pneumatic Parts & Control Circuit, Application of Sequence Controller on Pneumatic Control, Introduction to Hydraulic Engineering, Characteristic & Conditioning of Hydraulic Fluid, Hydraulic Theory, Power Unit, Actuator, Control Parts & safety,Hydraulic & Pneumatic Proportional & Servo Control, and Application of Automatic Control to Hydraulic Engineering.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 1. 在Multisim中繪製電路圖2. 在Multisim 中作電路分析3. 在Multisim中作電子電路分析4. 在Multisiml中作電路設計
description.en: 1. Circuit drawing in Multisim2. Electrical circuit analysis in Multisim3. Electronic circuit analysis in Multisim4. Circuit design in Multisim

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

notes: 機械四乙與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

notes: 土木四甲乙與最後一哩合開，限30人

name.zh: 創意與創新管理事業化
name.en: How to implement innovation into realized enterprise

description.zh: 在許多場合，無論是研討會、交流會等均會有許多創意點子出現，但多數的點子有如雨水一般，如果不能蓄存，散落後就消失；反之如果有系統收集，它就成為企業創新的主要來源，而透過企業創新的多元面向，如產品創新、流程創新、行銷創新等，均可為企業帶來附加價值，提升競爭力。本課程主要內容有產品創新、流程創新、經營模式創新、行銷創新、識別系統創新、組織創新、新事業創新、創意與創新管理事業化等，有助於學生將創意和創業事業化。
description.en: In many seminar and mutual discussion cases, there are many good ideas happened. But innovation like rain fall, if we don't have reservoir to keep it, It will rain everywhere and disappeared. If we have data base to collect all the innovation, It will to be value material in enterprise innovation. Through product innovation, process innovation and marketing innovation, It will bring high value to enterprise and rises its competing ability. From "How to establish an enterprise" classes, We find many students have many good ideas, If we can give them more advanced knowledge to use such ideas, It will benefit them success in establish an enterprise.

notes: 經管三與最後一哩合開，限180人，有2場參訪

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language I

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。 2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。 3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。 4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en: 1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan. 2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc. 3. description.zh: 為落實本校教學卓越計畫八大核心能力與「企業家的搖籃」之校本精神，本課程以創新與創業之企業家精神為基礎，透過多元化的講座課程，帶領學生了解經營管理、溝通表達與領導統御之內涵，以啟發學生解決各類經營管理問題的能力，開拓更寬廣的視野及思維，建立未來企業家的領導特質與求新應變的能力。本課程安排多家企業參訪，藉由實際參訪與交流溝通，深入瞭解企業經營的精髓與創新求變的精神，以培育學生具備未來成功創業家之管理、思辨與邏輯的能力。
description.en: In order to implement the school spirit of the eight core competencies of Teaching Excellence Project and "cradle of entrepreneurs," this course aims to foster future entrepreneurs by enhancing entrepreneurship based on innovation and entrepreneurship, through a wide range of lecture courses lead students to understand connotation of management, communication and leadership, ability to inspire students to solve various management issues, to develop a broader perspective and logical thinking, build the capacity of leadership traits and novelty strain of future entrepreneurs. This course is arranged to visit a number of enterprises, with the actual visit and communicate in depth understanding of the essence of the business management and innovation spirit for change, to nurture students have the ability of future successful entrepreneurs of management, reasoning and logic.

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(一)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:東協商務、文化
name.en: Development of global perspective: the series of ASEAN Community

description.zh: 東南亞地區向來為台灣的重要經貿夥伴，而東協十國已決定於2015年效法歐盟成立經濟共同體(ASEAN Community)，並積極尋求與日本、中國、南韓、印度、澳洲與紐西蘭等六國，簽署雙邊自由貿易協定，希望未來能建立一個30億人口、年經濟產值達九兆美元的「東亞自由貿易區」。希望藉由此次課程，讓學生瞭解東協成立後，臺灣的未來產業與市場發展，充實學生未來就業所需知識與技能。並藉由東南亞文化講座，開啟學生的國際視野，鼓勵學生實際透過度假打工、遊學、自助旅行、公益旅行、壯遊體驗等方式赴海外體驗學習，使其得以在經濟不景氣的時代下擴展未來的就業版圖。
description.en: Southeast Asia has been the most important economic and trading partner with Taiwan. Association of Southeast Asian Nations decided to found ASEAN Community in 2015, which takes European Union as a model. At the same time, it is vigorously looking for signing the Bilateral Free Trade Agreement with Japan, China, South Korea, India, Australia and New Zealand for the purpose of establishing an East Asia Free Trade Zone which accounts for the population of 3 billion of people and 9 trillion of GDP. We hope that we can make students learn more about this rising market after the establishment of ASEAN Free Trade Area (AFTA) by introducing them various aspects of Southeast Asia, including its cultures by means of taking part in a working holiday, a study abroad program, a backpacking tour, voluntourism, or a Grand Tour. After this class, students are expected to learn about new employment opportunities in this era of recession and high unemployment rate.

description.zh: 解析國內國家考試「會計學」之命題趨勢。並以實際國家考試考古題為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Resolve domestic national examination "Accounting" Trend proposition. And the actual state exam archaeological entitled case in the problem solving process to guide students to build a complete system of accounting theory, enhance students' understanding of accounting theory and application capabilities, develop logical thinking of students, and enhance problem-solving skills, passed the national exam.

notes: 經管三與最後一哩合開，限30人

name.zh: 國際觀培養:跨文化溝通
name.en: Feast for the global perspective—Cross-cultural communication

description.zh: We invite the domestic speakers, as the outstanding scholars of cross-cultural communication, to share their knowledge and experiences with students. By exploring the global issues such as social, cultural, political or economic studies, the course makes students learn further about the world, and inspires students to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective.
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions.  The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

notes: 最後一哩，限150人；第一次上課日期為10/6

name.zh: 就業達人講座:職涯多元方程式Ⅱ
name.en: Lecture: Diverse formula of career Ⅱ

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「就業達人講座-職涯多元方程式」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試應對技巧、魅力溝通表達、職場自我行銷、職場生涯規劃以及職場時間管理、壓力管理等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students’ competition and ability in the workplace. The course contains some subjects including tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career etc. By these topics, students will have variety of skills about interview and management that needed in the workplace to raise employment rate.

description.zh: 環境地質學是資源探採及地質工程的專業課程；透過環境地質的調查與研究，以了解自然資源之使用與工程相關之地質問題。內容包括：水、土壤、礦產資源、能源開發、認識地質作用對人類生存環境的影響、認識自然災害，瞭解人為破壞引起的災害、地質環境改變、人類衛生環境的影響及各種廢料處理等。並介紹環境地質圖、山崩潛感圖、土地利用潛力圖等環境地質學研究方法。
description.en: Environmental geology is a professional course of resource exploration, extraction and geological engineering; through investigation and study of the geological environment, in order to understand the use of natural resources and the engineering geological problems. The contents include: water, soil, mineral resources, energy development, understanding of the geological environment for human survival and understanding of natural disasters, understand the human damage caused by disasters, changes in the geological environment, the environmental impact of human health and the various waste processing. And introduce the environmental geology research method : environmental geological maps, landslide susceptibility map, land-use potential map.
